Great swim suit for full sun coverage. I wanted a suit to minimize the need for applying and reapplying sunblock on my 8 month baby this summer. My baby is fairly large for his age (about 30 inch height, 21 pounds at 8 months), so I ordered a 12-18 month suite. I am very happy with the size. While the arms are long for him due to sizing up, I simply fold the sleeves at the cuff once. The legs provide full coverage to ankles and the suite is nice and roomy. The material is breathable and quickly dries. I also love the zipper along the seam of legs, as it allows quick diaper access. The zipper from the collar also allows easy changing, even when the suite is wet.
summary: Great swim suit for full sun coverage

This leggings are great!  I was really worried about ordering them because of the no sizing.  When I received them, I was still worried.  I thought to myself, "There's no way I'm getting into these!"  I wear a 14-16 in ladies pants.  I'm none too small around the middle, either!  As I started pulling them over my feet I noticed how wonderfully soft they felt!  It's almost like a soft thin velvet.  But then, they don't feel thin once they are on.  These were plenty long for me.  I'm 5'8" tall.  I hate the leggings that are low waist.  What's that all about?!  These come up to my waist and could even be worn higher.  The elastic in the waist is nicely stretchy.  I was concerned about them giving me a muffin top.  They don't!  I get more of a muffin top from my underwear!
If you think you can't wear these if you're over fifty, think again!  I am 64 years young.  Just follow the rules of fashion for wearing them.  Wear long loose tops over them. Try this one available here on Amazon. A+D Womens Shortsleeve Loose Flowy Stretch Knit Crewneck Tunic (S-3X) Long enough to cover your butt!  These are not pants!!  They are leggings.  They are great for covering "older" legs.  They cover up all those spots that we get as we get older.  They also provide a little warmth.  If you really need a lot more warmth check into fleece lined leggings.  They are nice and cozy.
The price is right.  I ordered two.  Great quality!

Although the description says its a grey grid pattern mine is more black and ivory, which I prefer over grey.  Because of the neutral colors it can be paired with almost any color top, shoes and purse. I wish they made this skirt in every color of the rainbow! reviewText:
This skirt is just the cutest! It is very light, and super swingy, which I love!

So happy with my purchase!

Disclosure: I received this item at little or no cost in exchange for review. All opinions within this review are my own and are not influenced in any way. I like many others rely on product reviews to help me determine if I should purchase a product so I feel that honest product reviews are really quite important. If you feel that my review was helpful please click yes below!

I cant say that I am impressed with this skirt; however, I admit that I am somewhat to blame for my disappointment with this product. I was so incredibly excited to see this skirt (as I am a total Batman nerd). As soon as I saw this product listing, I repeatedly took my measurements and cross referenced them several times with the measurements listed to ensure I selected the correct size; regrettably, I neglected to fully inspect the section of the description that stated what material this skirt was made of. I based my purchase solely on the photo listed, which for some reason caused me to believe this skirt would be more like a scuba material or perhaps even cotton. Unfortunately, I opened my package to discover an incredibly thin, shiny, stretchy, and silky material. Furthermore, although I understand the Batman logo would only be printed on the outside of the skirt, I was somewhat upset that the inside of this skirt was bright white. This skirt has no hem on the bottom and this style is meant to flow, so the interior is definitely visible when you wear it. I think that a black interior would be an incredible improvement to this skirt. Honestly, it kind of reminds me of something a person might wear for a fun run or some other athletic team event. I am still going to try to find some occasion to wear it someday, but this is not something I feel I could just casually wear. Disclosure: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. This review is based upon my personal opinions and first-hand experience of this product. The discount I received has not influenced my review of this product in any way.
summary: I should have done my research

reviewText: I ordered this skirt for my daughter who is a big fan of these kinds of skirts and of batman. The skirt arrived quickly and just what I had expected it to be. The material was soft and it flows around when walking. It is very cute on my daughter. I purchased the Medium size skirt for my daughter who wears a juniors 9 or 11 depending on the style. The skirt fits her and it also fits my daughter who wears a juniors size 5. The waist is elastic and allows for it to fit a range of sizes. The skirt doesn't have a hem on the bottom and I find that to be annoying but neither of my daughters are concerned with it. I was able to purchase this skirt for a discounted price (NOT FREE). All of the opinions above are based on my own personal experience with the skirt and nothing else. The fact that I got it for a discounted price was not a factor in my opinion or my review. If you have any questions please feel free to click on the comment link at the end of my review, and I will do my best to answer it quickly.
summary: I like it, it is a cute skirt but lacks a hem on the bottom

reviewText: Batman is my favorite super hero so when I saw this awesome skirt I knew I HAD to have it. I wasn't sure what size to order because a lot of clothing like this piece come from China, which has a pretty significant difference in sizing than the US. I thought I'd play it safe and go for the medium. It fits me well. I would normally wear a US small but the medium fits my waist just fine. I have a feeling the small would too. The power of elastic! I'm short, about 5'1, this skirt hits right at/slightly above the knees on me. The Batman print is fantastic, no issues there. I'm leaving a 4 star review and not 5 stars because this skirt is not hemmed at the bottom. It won't be a problem as far as pilling or fraying but as a seamstress myself I think it looks sloppy without a hem. No hem seems to be the standard on digitally printed clothing. I understand why they didn't do one, but seriously, it doesn't look as nice. The lack of hem is my only complaint. I can't wait to wear this skirt to the next con if I don't happen to feel like cosplaying. Also I'll don the heck out of this skirt, going to be wearing it a lot. Plus, it gives me more reason to shout, "I am the bat, I am the night!" One of my very favorite things to say. I would feel confident giving this awesome skirt as a gift or recommending it to friends or family members. I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

We are Disney lovers and we were excited to see this Nightmare Before Christmas-like print for sale!  My daughter loves this style of skirt and they look cute on her.  She is 98lbs and 5'4".  This skirt fits her very well. I wear a large and this skirt definitely does not fit me. I would say the sizing is more small- a tight medium, but definitely not a large.  The elastic in the waist is not sewn very well and it gets twisted up.  I will sew it on the sides to secure it so this doesn't happen.  There is no hem in this skirt, but this type of fabric doesn't need a hem. She has many skirts and dresses made out of this stretchy lycra fabric and none of them have raveled or worn at all.  They are very washable and hold up great in the dryer.

UPDATE: I didn't notice at first, but the hem on this skirt is cut very unevenly. It is much shorter on one side than the other.
summary: Very cute skirt that fits small- a tight medium

This came on time packaged neatly.
The material is a bit thinner, so it requires a slip or neutral colored under garment. Not a deal breaker at all as I wear skirts in the summer at work to avoid burning up in dress pants so a super thick material would have been too much. I will say it makes for a great silhouette once on!!! Especially from the side. the buttons lay at a great angle to compliment the curve of the hips and are aligned nicely with one another. the lace trim is in great condition and did not fray from washing it upon receiving it. I do not dry my dress cloth so I can not say how it will fare in a dryer but it seems durable enough to be dried on a low or medium heat setting. I like the deep red color, I am very pale so any bright reds tend to make me look sickly so the deep red is a great compliment to the skin tone. Zipper on the side makes it easy to put on and take off, comfortable material to wear all day at work, was not itchy and breathed nicely.

I love Vera Bradley products! I have been using this wallet for more than a year and it has brought much happiness to my life. There are so many pockets that I can fit absolutely anything I want. Not only that, but it is small enough that I can wear it around my neck without suffering too much pain. It is great to put an ID in and wear to work. It is great as an everyday wallet. It is great for cash and even change. There is a zipper in the back of it for change that I use all the time! Also, because the zipper is so small, it ensures that I clear out my wallet all the time. I love Vera Bradley because it is the only affordable "name brand" on the market. This wallet is no different as far as the quality of their products go. It is great and will still hold up for many years to come. Other than being a bit stretched out, mine still looks brand new a year later. The newness one year later is impossible from a company that is not super expensive other than Vera Bradley! I like how there are so many patterns. I wish they had it rosy posies but that pattern is retired. Grr! Overall, I would highly recommend this wallet to anyone looking for something light and convenient.

reviewText: It was a quite dashing purchase!! LOVE IT!!

I tried on 28 different pairs of swim leggings from Amazon, and this was one of them.

The Bohn leggings (I tried 3 kinds: ankle length, 3/4 length, and skirted capris) are the cheapest feeling of all the brands I tried on. They are not, however, the cheapest cost wise. I can't recommend them.
3/4 length: Fit ok, not great. Very thin fabric, almost see-through, but not quite. Very stretchy; no support.
If you are looking for inexpensive leggings that are better quality and fit than these, try CocoShip brand swim leggings. They cost a fraction as much as Bohn. Cocoship was 4th on my list of swim legging brands. Bohn was last.

Ranking of Swim Legging Brands, from Best to Worst
1. Private Island
2. Coolibar
3. Undercover Waterwear
4. CocoShip
5. Sun Protection Swimsuits
6. EcoSting
7. Bohn
summary: Very cheap material; there are better (more inexpensive) options out there

reviewText: Not stretchy at all.

I really liked this dress, which is why I emailed the company in advance to order a customize size after reading other reviews. I got no reply from the company but included my measurements and order number in the message. I received the dress about three days later, which is awesome, but also means they just sent me the standard size 10, usually I wear 8 (150lbs 5,5"). The detailing of the dress was gorgeous and I really wanted to love this dress, but after a lot of effort to get the zipper up I could literally not breathe. Having kept dresses in the past with this scenario I find I avoid wearing them because of the discomfort, so I decided to send it back. The material seemed really nice, and well made, but I would recommend emailing the company for a customize size before making any kind of purchase. The chest area was a little roomy, but not bad, a fair amount of room around my arms and armpits (which is usually a problem for me), but the material has no stretch and there just wasn't enough room around my rib cage, just way too tight.
summary: Beautiful Dress, but way too tight around the rib cage

reviewText: This dress is absolutely amazing. I'm pregnant and love that I will be able to wear this dress now and after baby! Going to order some more colors before it's all gone.

This dress is very nice. It has a lovely neckline and the champagne color is very flattering. The dress is Flowey and feels very light on. I'm glad I made this purchase but I would recommend buying a size bigger. I have received this item at a discounted price for my honest review.

Body weight: 125 lbs
Height: 5 feet 4 inches
Bust-Waist-Hip: 34-29-37
Body type: Athletic/Pear
Size purchased: Medium

This dress is light, flowy, and very feminine. Its breathable, so it works well for the FL summer heat.  This dress reminds me of a shorter version of something you would see Daenerys wear in Game of Thrones if you just added a belt, which is why I personally like it.

This is best for smaller busted women. There is a slip attached to the dress to prevent your undergarments from showing, but recommend wearing nude undergarments for the white dress. A bandeau showed at the holes of the arms, but a strapless bra did not show.  The zipper on the back functioned well. I appreciate the length is short enough to be flirty, but still modest.

I was really nervous about the size based off of what other reviews said because I couldn't figure out what size I needed. I was actually going to order a large, but there ran out of stock at the time luckily. It does run a little small. I ended up with a medium, which fit me. For sizing, I recommend that you follow the chart they provided (not Amazons general sizing chart) as it seemed pretty accurate for the dress I received. (S - Chest: 33in. / Length: 34.5in.; M - Chest: 35in. / Length: 35in.; L - Chest: 37in. / Length: 35.5in.)

Overall I really like this dress and looking forward to wearing it out this summer quite a bit.

I have received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
I got the Alice in Wonderland print leggings and I LOVE THEM! The print is crisp and deliciously colorful - they match tons of stuff. They're that shiny spandex-y kind of leggings, so they're not the warmest or most "supportive" leggings on the planet, but I wear mine with some white cuddle duds at work (I work in a warehouse so it can get chilly I'm winter) and I'm golden.

These leggings get me stopped by strangers at the gas station, grocery store, library - everywhere! People love the whimsical pattern and want to know where I got em. Amazon!

For reference purposes, I'm 5'9" and about 130 pounds. These leggings fit fine - almost a teensy bit baggy behind the knees. I'd wager that ladies up to maybe 150-160 lbs could get into these leggings just fine. I've had no problems with seams tearing yet, and I am hard on these at work - lots of bending and stretching. I wash these puppies in cool water just in the sink and air dry and they do just fine, good as new.

Overall, great quality for the price. I'm very pleased!

This shirt is surprisingly really cute and comfortable! It came in exactly like what is pictured on the model (which is sadly rare nowadays with so many sellers using other people's photo that "look like" their product, but isn't actually the same)
Size: Fits very true to size! I'm 5'4" 124lbs 34C, I got a medium and it fits exactly how it does on the model. I usually always wear a small in tops unless I want to wear it with leggings (which I did with this shirt) then I'll get a medium. I was a little scared it might be too baggy since it already looks loose fitting on the model but I figured since its cotton, it would shrink anyway. I'm glad I got the medium because it fits exactly like the model, although I haven't washed it yet so hopefully it doesn't shrink too much. (I'll try and update once I do)
Length: The length is great for wearing with leggings. It's a curved hem with the sides going slightly higher to accentuate your curves.
Material: The feel of this shirt is really soft, which is always a plus. It feels like a rayon & cotton blend so it feels really nice on your skin.
Sleeve length: The sleeves aren't as long as shown on the model though. They're slightly shorter than I'd like but you can make this work. It's not noticeable because you can just pull it up a little like 3/4 sleeve, but I like longer sleeves so that was the main reason I didn't give this 5 stars, although I would've given it 4.5 stars if I could (the only other reason I didn't give 5 stars was because the sewing on the sleeve was noticeably snagged at the wrist, but I'll just have my mom resew it. I don't think this would be a problem for every shirt though)
The print on the Sleeves: The material is made up of a spandex material, which is great because it feels really nice on your skin, and the print itself is really nice. It's like a tribal print, and really gives the shirt something extra.
Buttons: They're all real (i.e. you can actually button and unbutton all of them) and look like the picture.
Shipping: Pretty fast. It was free shipping, which is always great, and it came in 11 days from my order date.
Overall, it seems like a really nice shirt. As long as it holds up in the wash, I would definitely recommend.

I would recommend this product to any couple or as a gift to a couple.

I have gotten a ton of compliments on it, and should I need another one any time soon I would definitely buy another. I think this would also be a great small gift idea for someone you think might be interested. Overall, great, soft, charming product and I highly recommend it!

Max Coburg Women's Formal Contrast Color Long Sleeve Black Pencil Business Dresses

My job has me on the road all day  in and out of homes, interacting with kids and pets, and in constant motion. My work wardrobe looks a lot like other peoples weekend-not-leaving-the-house-today clothes. Every once in a while something special will come up. My spider-killer will surprise me with an evening out, a charity event that requires that I look like the grown-up that chronologically I am, or one of my kiddos is involved in something and I get invited. Inevitably I greet those occasions with mixed feelings: while I love the thought of going, I hated the thought of finding something to wear. This stunning Max Coburg dress has changed that  I cant wait until the next invitation to go somewhere nice!

The Max Coburg Pencil Dress is a beautifully made dress that is suitable for everything from high-end business meetings to formal events. The 100% nylon fabric hugs curves without emphasizing flaws and offers an incredibly comfortable wearing experience. A covered zipper runs from the back of the neck down to the bra line and zips smoothly and easily. 2 inch cuffed sleeves in white contrast with the starkness of the black dress and give a finished, polished, feminine nudge. The fold-down V-collar is in the same white as the sleeve cuffs and creates a flattering face-framing appeal that is subtly sexy. The smooth silhouette is quietly provocative and the black color brilliantly hides problem areas (like my upper arms and tummy). This dress is hand-wash only and the tag indicates that it should not be soaked  I was concerned that warning was there due to an issue with colorfastness but I didn't notice any color bleed at all when I washed it. Im 53 and ordered this in a size L. The hem hits modestly just below the knee and is a knock-out with boots or stockings & heels. Stitching is tight, straight, and even. Hems and seams are finished beautifully. My favorite feature, by far, is that the nylon seems impervious to snags  I have never found that in any smooth finish dress before.

I received this stunning Max Coburg Pencil Dress at no cost in exchange for an unbiased review and love the quality, the fit, and the look!
summary: Great quality dress that is insanely comfortable, beautifully tailored, and subtly sexy

Just wow! This dress is absolutely GORGEOUS! I was surprised at how beautiful it is and how well it fits. My biggest fears with this purchase were that the dress would be too small in the chest area (I am a 36D) or too long (I am 5'0). I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this fit.

The chest area is ALMOST too small, but nothing that will stop me from wearing it. I don't need to wear a bra with this because it gives me good coverage. The dress is long, but the slits in the sides make it very easy and comfortable to walk in.

The material is perfect for a summer here in hot and humid Florida. The material is thin, but not cheap. It's thin enough to keep you cool all day long. The buttons are secure, so you don't have to worry about them popping off throughout the day. The material is easy to wash, too.

It's the style of this dress that makes it stand out among others. I LOVE the peek-a-boo waist area. I think it's a sexy touch, without it being too revealing. The buttons from top to bottom are fun and stylish. If I am feeling flirty, I unbutton the top 2. The slits are the side are gorgeous. This is a dress that I'd wear for a day of shopping in Miami or for a relaxing day on the beach.

I recommend this dress for anyone wanting a cool and stylish look for the summer!

reviewText:
I was amazed that there were watches made of wood with handmade links at an affordable price!

I bought the first Sandalwood watch by Ideashop July 2016 just to give it a try.  I have a large wrist (9 inch) so that was what pointed me to this watch.  I wore it for almost a year and had no issues at all, other than people commenting "I like your watch" or "is that made of wood??"

I then made the mistake of wearing it in the pool and in the ocean on vacation.  It is wood... duh!  And the instructions warned that it was not waterproof, only water resistant.  After submersion in the pool for an hour or so, some moisture was obviously in the face of the watch.  And the wood finish was dulled and made to look worn out out.  My mistake!

I got on Amazon as soon as we returned from vacation and saw they were still available, and quickly ordered a replacement.  I love the new one!  Looks great and works great!  It is darker than the original, but the finishes are expected to be different with wood.

By the way-- I kept the first one with the finish damaged and use it as my "work" watch whenever I am in a situation that might damage the new one.  The original still works great-- the moisture dissipated and the movement still works.

I would definitely buy again from Ideaworks
summary: Beautiful Handmade Wooden Watch with Redish Sandalwood Finish

reviewText: I love the wooden watches. Very lightweight and looks unique.

All right.....I don't like writing negative reviews (I'd rather return/exchange something), but when I receive a hunk o' junk and they won't exchange it, it makes me angry.
I really liked the look of this watch.  I purchased it for myself.  Several weeks later, it was simply gone.  Now maybe I took it off somewhere and left it (NOT what I usually do with a watch).  I suspected the band broke and I never felt it.
But my bad.....maybe.
So I ordered another one.  After a while, the watch began jumping ahead -- not stopping or slowing, just jerking forward so that I couldn't trust it.  It finally died.  Look, these are beautiful watches.  But in terms of reliability, unless you believe in totally disposable watches, these are terrible.  I suspect the band in the first instance.  But they have purchased terrible time-pieces for these watches.....and then won't offer returns, even within six months -- give me a break.
Fool me once, shame on Ideashop.
Fool me twice, shame on me.
A customer who really liked the look of the product -- who got burned TWICE.  Buyer beware -- seriously.
summary: I don't like writing negative reviews (I'd rather return/exchange something)

reviewText:
A lovely, handsome looking watch, but the crown/stem does not work.  When I push it all the way in the watch stops and it isn't a stop watch. One click out changes the time, two clicks out it changes the date.  Pushed in...time stops.  I brought it to a watch repairer, he said it is not repairable. Junk it! If Ideashop had any decency they would refund my money or send me a new watch.

Update:  I filed a claim under the Amazon Two Year watch warranty, that states: "a refund to you the amount you originally paid to purchase your Watch."  Refund means a repayment of a sum of money, typically to a dissatisfied customer. Well, they do not REFUND you your money, they give you an Amazon gift card. A gift card is not money!  A gift card is telling me where I have to spend my money.  I paid with cash, I want my cash back as it states in your warranty policy.  I've sent two complaints to Amazon Customer service and they have fallen on deaf ears. No reply.  I've been a customer of Amazon since 1998.  After this stint, I am no longer a loyal customer.

reviewText:
Ok... I realise a few people have said this coat is too small... so the product description says check the size chart to the side to make sure it fits... so I did... and its still too small.

I'm a small guy, so I checked the small size... 122 chest 72 length 50 shoulder 61 sleeve measured myself up, should be a pretty good fit. Got the coat... its pretty much 4cm shorter than that on every measurement.

Which brings me too my second point... It may be because its not the coat advertised. The coat that arrived is actually a Columbia jacket... and has large yellow columbia logos on it. Had I wanted a Columbia... I would have ordered a Columbia. I specifically chose this as it had no logos on it...

So, why do I give it two stars instead of 1... the coat is actually quite nice and pretty good quality... its just not the coat I ordered or the size it says... So I would suggest go two sizes over what you need. Which is what someone else mentioned in their review, and expect to get a different jacket (I saw somewhere else, someone got a Jack Wolf coat)

These are shoe laces, not shoes. The questions asked by Amazon regarding this product are not relevant. Bought these for our 11 year old Autistic grandson. He cannot tie shoes, even though he is far above average intelligence. These laces eliminated the necessity for him to tie his shoes in the conventional manner. He is very pleased with these laces and this solution has removed a irritating item in his life.

A suggestion: Because these laces are quite long, I had to trim them to our required length. I suggest heating the cut ends of the lace using a flame or touching to the electric burner on a cook top. This will seal the end and prevent unraveling. Also, tie an overhand knot in the very end of the lace to prevent it from pulling through the retaining lock.
summary: Perfect for those who cannot tie a conventional shoe lace

style.Style:: Tyger Eye & King Beads - Power Rope

reviewText:
This is a very beautiful, down to earth (literally!) bracelet. I love that it is adjustable because I have really small wrists and most bracelets are too loose and fall off very easily; Being adjustable relieves that problem. The whole adjustable setup is also easy to slide up and down for smooth removal or tightening.

This bracelet has a nice weight to it which can indicate the authenticity of the tiger eye stones. The stones are very beautiful and definitely of great quality as they are noticeably real and not plastic. They are nicely polished and the stones vary slightly in shape, shade, and pattern variations. Also, for those looking for the energy/effects of the bracelet (including me), this bracelet has the effect of bringing optimism, insight, power, integrity, etc that the tigers eye stone possesses.

Overall, this is a great quality, earthy stone bracelet that will last a long time and will be worn a lot! I received this item at a discount in exchange for my own, honest opinion.

I love stones, rocks, gemstones and semi-precious and I was thrilled with the quality of this bracelet once I opened the box and saw it with my own eyes.
I chose the nylon knot slider instead of a chain for the ease of putting it on and I like the choice I made, the bracelet stays on securely despite the solid weight of the beads and the knot does not loosen by itself. It feels very comfortable to wear, I wore it all day and all night as a slept and barely noticed I had it on. The round beads are extremely comfortable, they have a nice shape with a few have a small indent on close inspection. As someone who collects gemstone beads I am used to this and I think it adds to the character of a natural bracelet such as this.

Healing properties of Howlite - this stone, simply called "white" in the product description is actually Howlite. It is a calming, serene stone that reduces stress, helps you work through negative emotions and unhealthy attachments and helps open you to work with your angel and spirit guides. It aids healthy meditation and helps combat insomnia and anxiety. It helps you deal with situations with subtlety and tact. Think of it as a peaceful, serene stone. Be open to communication from angels and spirit guides by "coincidences," personal signs, intuition, repeating numbers and dreams.

To add icing to the cake the bracelet came in a high quality grey linen craft box with a beautiful logo (as a graphic designer these yummy aesthetic details things put an extra edge on a product!). The bracelet was nestled into a cutout in the foam, included a blueprint-type drawing of the bracelet on a card insert and everything about this screams "high-end product." You can tell some major care was put into designing and creating this product.

* I received this product at a discount for honest and unbiased review purposes. My review is my opinion.

My first impression of this bracelet is that it is a high quality piece of jewelry.  The box it came in is thick and perfect for gift giving.  I got the tiger eye power rope and I love it.  I wear tiger eye because it is supposed to aid in harmony and balance, it also helps to release fear and anxiety.  I chose the rope as opposed to the clasp bracelet because I have small wrists and was thinking I would be able to adjust the bracelet size.  It is actually not that adjustable, but it turned out to be a good fit.  I really like this bracelet and can't wait to purchase more items from this line!! I received this discounted product in exchange for my honest review.  Thank you bolt and stone!

Probably one of the highest beaded bracelet I own, and that's not because of its price, but because of the visible texture that the beads have. Tenzing - Tiger Eye - Rope The beaded bracelets I own have a matte finish. The beads are smaller than these, I believe these are the largest in my collection. Unlike my other bracelets' beads, these can easily be confused for very small marbles, which speaks a lot to its quality. I received many compliments when I first wore it, and its color is very vibrant and rich, especially in a well lit place. It was slightly difficult to put on at first because you have to hold one end of the rope while pulling the other. I just hold it with my mouth while pulling the other with no problems at all. I have medium sized wrists, ranging from 7-7.5 in. The bracelet hugged my wrist snugly with no extra beads hanging around or having needing more beads. Overall, I really like this bracelet. Yes, it's a bit pricey, however, it's pricey because it's such great quality. If you accessorize daily, and wouldn't mind spending a couple dollars extra to complete that great outfit, definitely consider this bracelet. Sample provided at a reduced or free price in exchange for an honest evaluation.
summary: The only high grade beaded bracelet I own. Its texture and quality is conspicuously and greatly visible than others I own.

style.Style:: Tyger Eye & King Beads - Power Rope

reviewText:
I received this bracelet much quicker than anticipated so that was a nice surprise!  It was received in a very sturdy, nice looking box.  The beads of the bracelet are threaded onto an adjustable rope with a small bead/ball at the end of each.  These 2 beads/balls help you to grab the strings to adjust the bracelet to your size.  I was able to adjust the size of the bracelet very easily but pulling on the ends of the rope.  It can be adjusted to fit almost anyone.  I was able to "open' it up wide enough that my husbands hand had no problem fitting in and I was also able to make it small enough to fit my tiny wrists.  The beads are simply beautiful and very smooth.  Overall I am very happy with this purchase,

* I received this item at a discounted price for an honest review.

Very nice package this arrived in, I was very impressed with the quality of the bracelet and the whole presentation. I wore it out on Saturday night and got a few compliments so overall I really like this and recommend it to anyone. I received this discounted product in exchange for a review.

style.Style:: Tyger Eye & King Beads - Power Rope

reviewText:
I've been really into gems and stones lately, and I am trying to find more jewelry I can wear, especially now since it's summer time. I have become particularly interested in tigers eye, blue sandstone and goldstone. When I came across this tigers eye bracelet I was super excited! The item was NOT prime, but I was pleasantly surprised at how quickly it arrived ( in about 4 days). It is send via USPS first class mail. When I opened the package I was immediately excited when I saw how lovely the package was. The bracelet was packed in a very nice gray box, inside the box laid the beautiful bracelet. The bracelet is adjustable (rope), and will get as big as about 10.5", the smallest is about 6". The 6" fits my wrists perfectly. The stones, oh my, the stones are lovely in my opinion. The beads are not perfectly round, as per the picture below you will see a close up of the beads, one of them actually looks like there is a chunk missing out of it, and others don't look fully polished, but this is how it is meant to look! It represents real gems,  how all of the gems are different than one another and no two are the same. I am so happy it looks like this rather, than a perfect tiger eye round ball. It gives it character. There are two balls that are connected to the rope, this will help adjust the rope. Overall I am very happy with this purchase, as it is beautiful and unique.

* I received this item at a discounted price for an honest review. This review is mine, and is no way reflected by the discounted price I received. If this review helped you make a decision about purchasing or not purchasing this item, please mark my review as helpful.

I just recently got this tensing bracelet in the mail and I absolutely love it!  First off, it comes very professionally packaged and that always says a lot to me when I receive a product and the box that it comes in is way more than I was expecting.  This would be ready to go if you were to gift it to somebody.  Another thing, inside the box there was a card with a cool little "blueprint" drawing of the bracelet that said thank you from the designer/seller.  This is my first "beaded" bracelet but I can tell that this is the company I will be going to if I plan on purchasing another one from.  I am very much into spirituality so to have this on already feels great.  The stones are actual stones and the bracelet has a weight to it, nothing crazy, but you know that is made of high quality.  I have already received compliments on it.  It fits great, and it will fit any wrist.  The two strings allow it to open up a bit to get on and it tightens down and stays there with just the pull of the two strings.  This bracelet is simply a very a high quality and appealing accessory.  I did receive this at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, that does not persuade me in any direction when leaving a review.  I use amazon as my go to when shopping and rely on reviews when making my own purchases and I take that into consideration when leaving mine, whether or not I get it at a discount.  I hope you have found this review helpful and if you have any questions please feel free to ask and I will try to answer them in a timely manner.  Happy shopping

Background, Fit, Quality:
This is the second pair of Speckaboo sunglasses I have ordered recently. I loved the other ones so I decided to get more for my 3 year old daughter. The fit is perfect. They don't fall off or cover too much of her face, but there's also room for growth so she'll be able to wear these for quite a while. The frame quality is great. It has strong, flexible plastic and the hinges seem like they'll stand up to the inevitable stretching that kids love to do.

Lenses, Case, Opinion:
The lenses arrived scratch-free, and they still don't have scratches after numerous drops. I love that the glasses come with a hard case so I can throw them in our  backpack and not have to worry about anything happening to them. The case is cute and the zipper works great. Though it honestly doesn't matter, I wish the case was a little more neutral and less boyish. If I had seen these in the store and my daughter tried them on, I would have been happy to purchase them based on fit and quality.

reviewText:
I bought this for my hubby as he was going to be heading out on a camping trip with some friends and wanted to have a poncho in case of rain. He was super excited when we got this in the mail. He was headed into the woods and mountains for 3 days, so he wanted something a little more "heavy-duty" than just a regular plastic poncho. I figured this would be a good one, since it is "military" and seemed to be a little better to me.

While he was on the trip, it rained 2 of the 3 days, so he really needed this poncho. He told me that it worked really great, and that he would have been soaked if not for the poncho. It kept him dry and warmer than without it. He was the only one of the group to have a poncho, and it saved him! The poncho was plenty big for him, and was actually big enough to keep all his clothes dry, and all of him dry but his boots. It is a heavy-duty, material that seems to be made of good quality. It did not rip or tear in the first few uses. Hubby told me he will always take this with him on any camping or other type of outdoor trips.

Overall, I do recommend this poncho to anyone looking to keep dry in weather. Would be great for sporting events as well.

*I received this product for a discount for my honest review*

I received this emergency raincoat at a discount for review. For starters, I was surprised by its heftiness when I first received it, and it is definitely sturdier and thicker than many ponchos out there. It fits big, which works very well as a poncho especially for emergencies. Holes in the right places as others have mentioned, and I can definitely see how this can be used as a camp/tarp. I can also see how one can use this to collect dew for emergency water supply, as it is waterproof and big enough to collect an appreciable amount of water.

reviewText: I received this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.  I received no other compensation.  All opinions are my own.  I have to say I absolutely LOVE this brand of tee shirt.  This company has the best designs in the world, ESPECIALLY if you're a cat lover (like myself).  I opened this shirt in front of my niece and nephews and they all loved it!  We've decided that instead of Captain America, this design should be called Kitten America!  I have to admit, this shirt is a little too small for me right now.  I ordered this shirt knowing it was way too small for me right now just to have...I'm trying to lose a little weight and I think this is great motivation!  Anyways, my youngest nephew actually wants me to look and see if I can find this shirt in a smaller size for him...which I'll probably do some time today.  He loves Avengers and all things super hero related, but also loves cats like me...so this shirt fits him to a T!  I ordered the XL.  I'm typically a 3XL or 4XL shirt, so I didn't even attempt to put this on yet.  I did note a few things, though.  First, this shirt has an awesome design.  I think anyone could enjoy the humor in this shirt.  Second, this shirt is lightweight and I think it would be great for summertime.  I don't think I'd recommend this shirt for cold weather but that's okay because it's a tee shirt.  Third, this shirt does seem heavy duty.  I feel like this shirt will withstand many, many washes and still look great!  There are no loose strings and the stitching seems pretty sound.  Overall a very, very nice shirt and I would DEFINITELY buy again!  I cannot wait to see if this company ever decides to make big and tall sizes.
summary: Must get this in a smaller size!

I love these Speckaboo sunglasses for my four year old, and he loves them too! The sizing information provided by the seller is accurate and helpful, as these are a great fit on my child's face. As with many four year olds, my son stretches the arms of these glasses when putting them on his face (instead of holding them by the frames and pushing them on), but it seems like these glasses are built to withstand such use/abuse because the frame material is pliable, not a hard plastic. My son wears sunglasses to keep the sun out of his eyes (not necessarily for fashion), and the Speckaboo lenses (grey smoke in our case) block out enough sunlight to keep him happy. reviewText: Person who received it said it fit perfectly. Colors are really vibrant too! It hasn't shrunk so far and we've put it in the dryer a few times already.

I got this shirt as gag gift for my nephew who absolutely loved it.
I purchased the small sized shirt for my 13 yr old nephew and it fit him perfectly. It was a tad bit baggy but it was comfortable as he told me. The shoulder seams were proportionate to his shoulders. The width of the shirt is what was a bit big compared to him but there's room for him to use it as he grows and in case it shrinks over time. It is as long as he is so he doesn't "swim" in the shirt.
The shirt is really well made. The graphic on the front has rich, vibrant colors and it is as big as it seems in the photograph. It takes up about 1/2 the front side of the shirt. We haven't hand washed it and as the instructions direct, the washing machine is set at delicate and cold when washing this specific shirt. It has survived multiple washes and has not yet flaked or distorted in color or shape. He loves wearing it and the shirt, after about two weeks, looks the same it did as the day I received it. The colors do not run so they did not affect the rest of the whites that I had put in with the shirt. It did not noticeably shrink after its first wash. It hasn't been put in a dryer considering the caution advised by the company against extreme temperatures so it's left in the garage to air dry after being washed. It's not inconvenient and just takes a few hours to completely dry out.
The cotton is soft, thick and durable. The fibers have not unraveled, torn or distorted after multiple uses. It breathes relatively well so skin doesn't suffocate underneath it. Since the small size fits a 13 yr old, I would advise sizing up for purchases. If you wear a large normally, an xl may be a more comfortable fit. If you plan on using this in the washing machine and dryer, I'd advise going up two sizes just in case. It's always more comfortable to have a bigger shirt than one that's skin tight.
pros
-excellent graphics
-vibrant, sharp and long lasting colors which don't run in the washing machine
-soft cotton is both comfortable and durable

The shirt looks great, fits perfectly, and has sharp, vivid colors. Although it does require some care for the longevity of the shirt, it's not something that warranted a star deduction. The shirt is unique and my nephew loves it. I would caution that you size up when you're purchasing, as I mentioned earlier considering that the sizes run a bit small.
I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. The company did not compensate me in any way. Discounted merchandise does not guarantee a positive review so my rating directly reflects the product quality and function. I have provided an honest and completely unbiased account of my experiences. All stated opinions and views are absolutely my own.

reviewText: Space

This bag is absolutely gorgeous! The products featured picture does not do the bags actual appearance justice. It's a large bag so it fits everything you need and because of how fashionable it looks it doesn't appear clunky. The leather is stiffer which I appreciate because it does not lose its shape.  It was a lovely surprise that my bag had the red lining too.

I originally saw it someplace else but it sold out there and I'm so happy I was able to find it on Amazon.

This collection has a sophisticated color palette. The colors are so unique that I bought 2 of these bags nd my husband bought a third for Valentine's Day: marine, burnt orange and light gray (which has blue undertones)
The Good:
Colors are rich, bag is roomy but not too wide, strap drop works well for my height (5'9), cute little coin purse has a back pocket and inside zip. Bag is structured so that it stands on its own (I have a black pebble leather drawstring I really enjoy that sort of collapses onto itself once its set down).
The Bad:
The tassels at the end of the drawstring are large so it stops the bag from opening as wide as it could.
The Ugly:
I doubt that I will buy saffiano leather again. I am a great fan of the rich Dooney leathers. Saffiano feels like coated canvas. Also, when I draw my pebble drawstring up it stays closed; this saffiano stuff allows the drawstring to relax just the slightest bit so the bag doesn't cinch as tightly as it could. Believe it or not the O rings look so much like gold plastic I literally had to bite one to assure myself they are metal (they are).

Shipping was a bit of an issue. When I checked the Fed Ex tracker my packages were scheduled to arrive on Friday; perfect since we were going out of town Sat. No packages on Friday so we cancelled the trip. They shipped Smart Post from I Love Dooney so the arrival date the tracker gave was the date the packages arrived at my post office, not at my house. Thanks, Fed Ex.

Overall I am happiest with generous sized structured bags that I can toss all my stuff in, then throw on my shoulder. These bags fit that bill nicely and the colors are stunning. Had this bag been offered in these colors in pebble leather my rating would have been 6 stars because I am a solid fan of Dooney's design, material and workmanship.

Absolutely beautiful and the perfect piece for my favorite cocktail dress!  This bracelet is stunning. The stones shine beautifully, and so does the metal. A few things I wanted to mention:
Size- I have an average to large size wrist and this fits me just fine with a little room to spare, so I'd say it would fit most.
Stones- They are beautiful. Honestly if I didn't know any better I would think they were real. They are also a good size. Not too small so you're squinting to see them, and not too big that you KNOW it's fake.
Design-The design is nice too, different than the usual plain tennis bracelet. I like the wave design that it has. I think it makes it unique and special, and more of an eye catcher.
Metal- The white gold plating gives it an extra shine in my opinion.
Clasp- It says it has a lobster clasp. I'm not really sure if that's what it is? I don't know the name for it, but it's the kind that looks like a stapler, loops around the other side and then snaps shut.

This is a beautiful bracelet, that would go with anything. And it's priced wonderfully too, especially compared to some I've seen on here.

This does everything I wanted a wallet to do, and somebody put a lot of thought into making this far, far better than I was expecting it to be. I cannot say enough good things about the layout of this wallet. I've had this for a little over two weeks now and I'm still finding little things that I like about it. It's replacing a well loved, brown leather bifold wallet, and I was used to the extra length by the end of the third day. This is my perfect wallet.

There's a giant pocket when it fully opens up that I use to keep whole sheets of paper in, which is really nice when I want to have a printout of something on hand, or need to take a few quick notes and know that I actually have something to write on. They don't tell you that it's there

The leather is really soft, and even though it's orange, it still has a really nice leather smell to it.

That extra long pocket/compartment is incredibly deep, and I've been using it as a dedicated spot to keep receipts and coupons.

It's meant to hold a checkbook, and they actually thought to include a pen pocket with enough room for the pen clip.

It's long enough that I can pull it out of my pocket while I'm sitting in the car without having to unbuckle the seat belt and get up.

I got the orange version (I'm never losing my wallet in plain sight again), and it's actually the color in the photo. That might seem like a small detail, but the fact that what you see is actually what you get is really reassuring.

I could not be happier about this wallet.

3 month update: The wallet is no longer the bright orange that it was when I got it, and that was to be expected from any piece of new leather. It is still orange, just in a slightly more tamed fashion. What I didn't expect was how it is gradually wearing from orange to black, especially on the surfaces that take a lot of contact. I initially thought it somehow got dirty, but after a gentle cleaning, it was apparent that it was the material itself changing color. The more wear any given part of the wallet gets, the darker it will become. I'll note that this has been a daily use wallet in the back pocket of my pants, that the coloration is on the wallet itself and hasn't affected my pants at all, and this will likely never be a concern for you if you keep this in a purse or the breast pocket of a suit.

There is an opening on the inside of the change holder, which I'll just re-sew myself by hand, and probably reinforce with a very light glue or contact cement. This isn't a failure of the wallet itself, it's because I was using it beyond how it was intended to be. I keep this wallet in my back pocket, so gravity is keeping all the change in the bottom of the pocket. Combining a lot of change in the thinnest area with the stitching going into the lightest material, in a high use and high wear position means that this isn't exactly unexpected. The zipper itself still works flawlessly.

The plastic flap that is meant to hold the checkbook open so you can write checks directly on the wallet is still intact, and works very well.

This is still a five star wallet for me, and I'm ordering a second one as a backup in case anything ever happens and I lose this one.
summary: far better than I was expecting it to be

reviewText: I can't recommend Envirosax highly enough. For anyone who intends to use reusable bags but can never remember to bring them to the store, they are the prefect solution. They roll up into a tiny tube shape that fits easily into your purse, backpack or coat pocket so you can always have them on hand whenever you do some last minute shopping. I've been keeping envirosax in my purse for several months, and I haven't used a single disposable bag except for when I've taken leftovers home from a restaurant and they put in in a plastic bag without asking me. They are also incredible durable, and hold much more weight than a disposable bag of the same size. Obviously, the pattern on the bag depends on your personal preference, but I think Jessie and Lulu is pretty adorable. Check out the other designs if you don't like it. They also make a lot of plain, solid colored bags. These bags definitely have an array of other potential uses to, such as a beach bag, etc.

reviewText:
Insoles for Men From SHINAP: Comfort Shoe Insoles, Cut to Size, Lightweight & Breathable, Moisture Wicking Shoe Inserts. Perfect for All Shoes & All Sports, Athletics, Work, Running, Hiking! 

Lately one of my favorite pair of dress shoes started to get the insides all worn out and the shoes were starting to hurt!  I tried to switch the insoles from an older different pair of shoes and see if that helped but that only made matters worst.  This new insole was a little smaller (even though it was the same size) and would slide around a lot on the inside and would cause it to fold and be an issue.

So when I got these I was excited because they had a little padding and they were able to be cut down to be an exact fit!  I wear around a size 10 so as soon as these came in I pulled the scissors out and started working!

Even though I used extremely sharp scissors, these were not the easiest to cut.  As you can see in the pictures its not perfect.  But once I cut them down a couple of time to get a perfect fit, it worked!  These fit the WHOLE insole and were extremely comfortable!  These insoles are light weight and feel soft on you feet!  You get a small amount of cushion on your heels too!  These are really good at moisture wicking too!  I highly recommend for anyone needing to replace or for anyone that wants a little extra support or cushion.

Click YES if this review was helpful.  If you have a question, leave a comment and I'll answer you!  Feedback helps me improve my review! Thank you!!!

I received a discount so the product can get an honest review.  I am an avid online shopper and I want everyone to be happy and satisfied when they order online thats why I like to provide pictures or a video!
summary: Extremely comfortable, perfect fit, and moisture wicking!!!

reviewText:
Insoles are that important to get? From me I would say yes. In most shoes, insoles are often the very inexpensive piece of item the manufacturer puts into a shoe. You may notice this when buying shoes, the insoles doesn't seem too great. Depending on the brand, the quality may feel real cheap like a thin piece of paper. It often provides little to no cushioning or stability.

From my experience of buying mens dress shoes, I do feel a difference with better quality insoles. Even the expensive shoes I buy, I get disappointed when insoles are not good and doesn't provide support. Spending more than 8 hours a day on my dress shoes with thin or worn out insoles will lead me to experience some foot aches. Plantar Fasciitis may flare on occasions.

That even includes soccer cleats. Having bought expensive Adidas and Nike cleats, the inside will get beat up and wear out fast due to the constant running of soccer. I have experience some painful blister under my foot with a worn out insole from my Adidas cleats. So anytime you see it peeling or its breaking apart, its time to get new ones.

For those reasons I got this product, SHINAP Mens Sports Insole. What I like I can use be used for either athletic or dress shoes. Comparing to one of my old Dr. Scholls, I find it provides excellent if not more support. The level of thickness is great due to the material and designed of a Lightweight soft HI-Polyethylene low-profile footbed. Attached to the bottom is a soft blue latex material that provides excellent cushioning in the heel and forefoot area. I was able to cut my shoe size easily with the guided lines.

Knowing not all feet are the same, having proper footwear is something we all share. If you find insoles to be very important for comfort in your  wear of shoes, please consider SHINAP. I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText:
Fringe Ankle Boot- Western Cowgirl Closed Toe Bootie - Low Heel Casual Comfortable Cowboy Walking Boot
As I sit and read some of these reviews it's a bit concerning to me that the majority of buyers seem to think that product testers are giving all these companies and products A5 star review just because a product tester receives the product either for free or at a deep discounted price 90% of the time it is at a discounted price I would know that because I am a product tester and I can assure you that my reviews are solely based on my personal unbiased opinion of the product and the product alone I do not write the review based on Packaging shipping time or anything like that that would be based on a seller review but I promise you any reviews that I do are based on my product testing alone as if I went and spent the exact dollar amount of the item specifically as it says on Amazon and believe me I have given a one-star review in my time and if I could give it a negative there is a few that I would have done so as well so please just note that any review I leave is a unbiased honest review straight from my personal opinion as if I paid for the item at full price it's not fair to the company for potential buyers just because there's some people out there that are product testers y'all can become product testers to it's very simple just do the research online but please no that you can definitely rest assured that my reviews are unbiased thank you please continue to read my review, Not every product tester gives a review a five star rating just because they received a discount of free item. ACTUAL REVIEW OF PRODUCT:

reviewText:
There once was a fair maiden who had an obsession.  Her obsession was with sparkly shoes.  Glorious, sparkly shoes made her smile.  They made her giddy.  They made her feel better about eating a couple cookies (fine, half the box).  Shoes don't care if you gain a few pounds unless a pregnancy is involved, but that is a whole different story.

This fair maiden happened upon a set of super cute silver shoes, and guess what?  They were full of sparkles!  It was if the amazon angels were singing!  She hit add to cart and went on with her merry day with a new spring in her step.
The day came when the shoes arrived.  The fair maiden tore open the box and stifled a yelp of surprise.  The shoes were even more sparkly and grander than she had imagined.  Let it be known that in the past, this is the part of her story that has ended in tears.  Sometimes when the shoes are ordered online they don't fit and the fair maiden had to exchange them.  Sadness would ensue.  However, the amazon angels were still with her as she slipped her foot into a sparkly shoe.  The fit was perfect!  The shoes looked amazing!  They felt amazing!  Even the box they came in was super cute!

****Let it be known that if I could give these shoes six stars I would.  GET THEM!  THEY ARE AWESOME!!!****

reviewText: I am so happy with these booties. I love the look and the color. The fringe is the perfect length and the perfect amount. They are a little tighter than expected, as I ordered my true size. I would recommend ordering a 1/2 size up although they will stretch as you wear them. Although they are a little tight the length is fine and I could easily wear them all day. The color is a light camel color and just right for any outfit. I bought these at a discounted price for my honest unbiased opinion but that in NO way influenced my review. They are well constructed, a pretty suede, with a sturdy zipper and awesome style. I plan to wear these with a skirt, dress, leggings, or skinny jeans (to show off the sexy fringe) The heel is low but a great height for casual wear and with a skirt would be super cute without looking like too much going on.  I love my high heels but would not want these in any higher because the focus in on the fringe and the awesome construction. They are reasonably priced and you would pay much more for equal or lesser quality. I am very happy and impressed with this purchase.

How hard can it be for shoe makers to make a really soft, well-cushioned shoe? After 20 years of foot pain, I've been aching (literally) for shoes like these. I've never had a more comfortable shoe.
Several layers of cushioning is built into the sole, yet that sole doesn't look obnoxiously thick.
I tried these on in a local shoe store, but they only had one color, the gray rather shiny version, and they looked like nurses shoes. This is the only seller who had a different Joya color. These look handsome.
I just wish their slightly dressier leather model had the same cut as this athletic version; unfortunately the leather ones are taller on the sides and cut into my ankle bones.
Note: I paid for these. I did not receive them as a promotion. This is a truly unsolicited review.
Side note: Amazon screwed up this order. I selected size 11 but Amazon always put size 11.5 in my cart. NOT what I wanted. If this happens to you, send a direct message to the seller; they will respond quickly and tell you if your size is in stock. Fortunately, mine was.

reviewText:
These Pixie yellow sunglasses are absolutely adorable and are very gender neutral with the exception of the carrying case which is pink/purple (but still super cute). I purchased these for my son. He has broken his last three pairs of sunglasses (broke the frame, popped lenses out, stepped on them). These seem to have done the trick, the frame is VERY flexible and my son has not yet destroyed them. The lenses seem very secure as well and I really appreciate the reflective lens. They are perfect for us, as we live in the desert and at elevation and I do worrying about my sons eyes in with the harsh sun.

The feeling of these sunglasses is very nice. They are incredibly soft and the flexible frame seems very comfortable, they do not squeeze my sons face at all. They fit him well right now but the long ear pieces will fit him for years to come. I also appreciate that these were sent with a carrying case. All of the other sunglasses we have purchased have not come with a case. This will ensure that we can keep these glasses in a good condition.

These glasses are very cute and come with an awesome case. My daught er likes the clear lens so they look like real glasses. I love that they protect her eyes. Kind of big for my 6 year old.

Quality and Fit:
The most important thing is that these are well made. The plastic is strong, yet flexible. Very important for sunglasses worn by kids who like to bend their glasses. The hinges are in good condition and seem like they will hold up to inevitable stretching. I gave these to my 3 year old daughter, but I tried them on myself to check the lenses. They block a good amount of glare from the sun, don't collect fingerprints easily, and arrived with no scratches. After being worn (and dropped) multiple times over the last 10 days, they are still scratch-free. These perfectly fit my 7 year old, but they fit my 3 year old better than most sunglasses. She has 1 other pair that fits well, but all others tend to be too big.

Design and Case:
The pink mirror lenses are unique, at least compared to anything else I've bought for my kids. They've only had the traditional dark lenses, so my daughter was pretty excited about the pink. The hearts are a nice touch to add some color and to make them cute. I could do without the logo in the corner of one of the lenses, but it's small and doesn't negatively affect the vision so it's not a big deal. The listing doesn't mention these come with a case, and I didn't look at all the pictures, so I was happily surprised when they arrived. It's a hard case that helps keep the glasses nice and safe when I chuck them in our backpack. The design is cute, and the zipper works well. I really like the glasses, and I'm very happy about the addition of the case.

Disclosure:
I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I have not been compensated in any way, nor promised any future promotions. I have no affiliation with the company at all, and I am not required to leave a positive review. All thoughts are my own and have not been influenced. If I encounter any issues in the future, I will update my review and adjust my rating accordingly.

reviewText: We ordered the shorter, two tier veil in both ivory and white since my daughter wasn't sure which color dress she was going to go with. Oh my gosh! These are beautiful, well-made veils. The quality is like you would see in that famous big box wedding store for about $75 or more. The pearls are well attached and give it a simple but elegant look, the satin binding is very smooth and looks great, not sloppy at all The comb is attached very securely and is big enough to stay put wherever you want to put it! We are thrilled with both veils and are so glad we took the chance. Highly recommend this seller to anyone who needs a wedding veil. Will add pictures as soon as we can take some. It does need to be steamed to get the wrinkles out when it first arrives. We hung them in the bathroom through a couple of showers and the wrinkles came right out! I will add, the ivory veil is a light ivory, it's darker than the white, but you may want to dye it with a little fresh brewed tea to make it more of a dark ivory/champagne color if you are looking or those shades.

reviewText:
Warm, waterproof and sturdy describes these boots. Living on a farm in the winter means lots of wet, cold and dirty encounters with the outdoors. My two and a half year old loves to "help" and so needed boots to keep his feet warm, and dry. They also needed to be easy to wash.
These have fit that need perfectly. They have kept his feet toasty warm at temps in the lower teens and single digits. Being rubber, they are fully waterproof to the top of the boot, and that also means they are easy to clean. The outside can be sprayed and he can put them right back in with no time needed for drying.
So far there has been no trouble with the liner slipping out when he takes off the boots. It is removable, but we've had no need to take it out. The boots are roomy so that may change later.
He is normally a size 8, but we bought a 10. They have extra room, but not so much that they are clumsy to wear.
We have not needed to use the snow gaiter yet, so I can't say anything about that.

I would definitely recommend these if you are in search of  a practical, warm, waterproof boot.

If you're looking for a fake celine bag and refuse to pay over $2000 like I do, this bag is a great alternative.

reviewText: I love this purse

I have an authentic Celine purse and let me tell you, this is a great replica. I was skeptical as to what I was going to receive, but I was very impressed with the quality and the sturdiness. It looks pretty authentic, of course it does not have the logo, but if it wasn't for that, the inner lining and the loop/clips on the sides, I would think it was real. It is just about the same size as the authentic one. I was worried it would be a shiny material but it actually wasn't. It has a litttttle but of a shine but barely noticeable, I got the navy blue color. I absolutely love it! I was looking for a new "diaper bag" and I think this will definitely works. I don't want to worry about baby powder, milk and/or smashed Cheerio crumbs in the real one. Also, it arrived super fast!! I ordered it on March 29 & was supposed to receive it by April 25-May 6. I received it this past weekend, April 9! Couldn't get better than that, I totally recommend it!!

reviewText: Cute! This raincoat fits more or less true to size in the arms/shoulders, but it's a very wide baby-doll style and could benefit from a belt. The fabric is like a very thin windbreaker, I washed it and the water beads off, so it seems repellent. The dot pattern is very small, like a micro Swiss dot. The removable hood with drawstrings is pretty long, and would cover your face in a downpour. Comes folded in a small matching bag, and still has a few creases after washing, hopefully they will go away eventually. Overall, I wouldn't recommend for heavy rains, but it's a nice, cute coverup for a light rain day, great for layering, portable in a purse or car, with unusual style.

reviewText:
I ordered this necklace after I saw my friend with one in silver and loved it.  As soon as it came, I had to put it on and model it for daughter who quickly asked if it was hers (I take this as a compliment!) When I wore it to work the next day, I also received several compliments from my co-workers.

I was impressed with the sturdy construction of the necklace itself, it was crafted with a heavier metal than I expected and held up well to my 2yr old pulling at it randomly. I will certainly be wearing this again, thank you!

I received this product mentioned above at a discounted price or for free in the hope that I would write a review for it. I was not required to write a positive review. The opinions I have expressed are my own. I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for those reading the review. Tie vs bow tie?! With this set you get the best of both! Then you can debate privately in the comfort of your own home!

I've heard that traditional ties make you look thinner than a bow tie on account of keeping with the vertical lines..

While theres some debate about that, the simple fact of the matter is; if you want to go formal you need a bow tie.  Its really going to be your best look anyhow.

The thinning power of vertical lines not withstanding, a bow tie is going to emphasize your manly physique as a whole.  One of the strongest elements of formal tradition is the starkly contrasted white V of the shirt against the black buttoned jacket.  The wider top of the V accentuates and broadens the shoulders, while the narrow bottom creates the illusion of a thinner waist.  The bow tie is integral in this illusion, as it draws attention to the wearers face.  A long tie, however, dissects the formal V into smaller and more obscure sections that just don't have the same effect.  Long ties also direct attention away from the face and towards the naval.

Also, long ties are more common when wearing a suit.  The saying goes, If you wear your tuxedo like a suit, it will look like a suit.  , you want your tuxedo to look like one; different from a suit youd wear any other day at the office.

Time has proven that a tasteful bow tie worn with a tasteful tuxedo will never go out of style.  Its no coincidence that the bow tie is the namesake for the Gold Standard in Formal Tradition, Black Tie.

reviewText:
Reason for Purchase:  I purchased the Mens Fashion Polyester Skinny Neck Tie, bowtie and pocket square for my husband, who wears ties every day at work and wear suits frequently.  The blue background with the white and orange really caught my eye and can go with a lot of different shirt colors and styles.
Merchandise:  The pack came with a skinny neck tie, a bowtie and a pocket square.  It has a dark blue background with alternating white and orange flowers, the petals alternate their orientation too for a neat pattern. The skinny tie is a typical length and width of a skinny tie and the bow tie is a standard size.  The pocket square is a typical six inches by six inches.
The good: The color combination of these pieces is absolutely wonderful. The sizes are great and nothing out of the ordinary. People looking from afar will never notice these were a cheaper purchase when put up next to a shirt and suit.
The not so good: The quality of this merchandise is okay.  It will definitely last for a while but it is not the same quality as the very expensive ties you would buy at stores such as Lord and Taylor or Nordstroms.
Recommendation: I would recommend this set of tie, bowtie, and pocket square for anyone looking for an okay quality and great color combination.
Please note I received this product at a discount for an honest review.

I needed the bow tie specifically for an Eleventh Doctor costume.  (You:  'What does that mean, ...an 'Eleventh Doctor?' Me:  "...Doctor Who?"  You: "Exactly.")  This is a nice set, inclusive of all the pieces, and while you can tell it's not silk, it's definitely not low grade polyester.  It's a heavy grade fabric, with a decent drape, and not too much sheen, particularly on the bow tie, which catches just the right amount of light in the folds.

However, the skinny tie is reeealllly skinny, and measures only 1.75 inches.  It works for me, since I'm female, but if you're a burly lumberjack or The Incredible Hulk, then it might be a little too mimsy.  I have the color #6, and I can confirm that the product image is accurate.  The color choice actually caused me a lot of stress because burgundies can be so nuanced, and I couldn't tell whether it was a plum-toned burgundy or a brown-toned burgundy.  The answer is:  it's a brown-toned burgundy, like claret or a dried nosebleed.  (Gross, but descriptive.)  The silvery-white dots are very nice--they're actually squared dots, which give the pattern a little more flair.

The bow tie adjusts easily----having spent plenty of time trying to deal with a self-tie bow tie, I'll say that there's no shame in going the pre-tied route.  It looks neat and tidy, and is less likely to propel you (me) into a Hulk rage.  (smash.)  You can see how both ties pair with patterned white shirt in the photos below.  Mixing patterns is a great idea.

---I accepted a sale price on this set, in exchange for evaluation and objective review.  If I didn't like it, I'd return it, but I think I've made a pretty wise choice---it's a handsome set.---

This Nackiy punk leather alloy Indian cuff is a wonderful size and look.  I know they say it is for men, that said it isn't so big that a women could not wear it.  It is large but not heavy to wear at all.  I was really happy to open up the package and not smell any chemical or product smell that was offensive.  The cuff is made of leather and does not contain nickel chromium or other heavy metals that are toxic.  The Indian cuff weighs 30g making it easy to wear.  It came in a plastic sleeve that was easy to open keeping the cuff in perfect condition when it arrived.  Here is an inexpensive way to get a fun, funky cuff to wear.  I did get this product in exchange for a honest review.  I tried to take some detailed pictures so you can see the details of the cuff up close.  Thanks so much!

This bracelet is really awesome!  It has three different snaps for different sized wrists.  One of the main features that I like about it is that it is very obviously heavy-duty genuine leather on the outer surface, but is smooth-textured on the inner surface so that it doesnt irritate or rub the skin.  The overall design is great, and I can tell this bracelet will last a long time.  This would make a great gift!

Sigh.
