reviewText: Perfect
Keeps me warm
Great product.

I have owned a few balaclavas, and this one is the best by far, especially for the price!

I felt the need to buy a new balaclava for my upcoming trip to Iceland, mid-winter. The fabric is entirely fleece, and is a very dark black. The hood opening is adjustable, and the lower part of it near the neck can be tucked in under a coat so it looks like you're wearing a hooded sweatshirt.

This item is totally versatile, and completely blocks out wind for maximum warmth. You also have the added benefit of looking and feeling like a ninja when you wear this. Cannot recommend this item enough!!!
Very warm and covers most of your face in bitterly cold weather.

This ski mask is really nice to have! I live in an area where we get large amounts of snow and bitter cold winds and this mask really provides warmth from the elements. It fits snug to your face and does not obstruct your view like some masks can. It is also very soft and works as a hat, scarf and partial hoodie. The draw strings allow you to pull this as snug or as loose to your face as you want This is a great item to have along with other winter gear for added warmth. I would recommend this item for anyone who spends a lot of time outdoors in the cold elements.  I had the opportunity to review this item at a reduced rate for an unbiased an honest opinion.
summary: This ski mask is really nice to have

reviewText:
I love how this little hood is so versatile. My hubby swiftly took it over (he calls it theft by acquisition). So he has this medical condition called trigeminal neuralgia which is horrific electrical facial pain and this makes a huge difference for him and taking the dogs out when it's windy. It does a good job of protecting the face and is soft and comfortable.

It comes down and protects the face and is a perfect compliment to any sweater, coat or jacket... or sweatshirt that is now practically a hoodie. The tie is there if you need it, but I don't think I've ever seen anyone actually tie them...

Review sample provided free or at a discounted price for a fair, unbiased, and honest review. This is my honest opinion because no product or review is worth hurting my account or reputation.
summary: turn every sweatshirt into a hoodie!

reviewText:
I am a girl born in New England, lived in New Jersey, went to college in Boston! I know cold and I have had my share of snowy winters!! When I ordered this I knew it would be great for my trip to Colorado and to Boston! I am in Florida -BUT funny we have had 40 degrees weather!

I washed it first, and then tried it on! Oh my goodness, so soft and plushy! I didn't even want to take it off! It was so nice on my skin, I love the feel of it. The quality is great! I have sat out doors on our lanai after dark, to just enjoy the cool crisp air in the 40-50's -and have actually worn this! Used it as well for a cold night bike ride! My husband as well -has used this- and he loves it! He will usually wear a fleece hat in the cold because he is bald, this keep the heat in!

It is a nice fleece, a super soft material. It has great protection over the ears and covers the neck! We both like that it has a nice fit over the neck and shoulder area, and with the draw string you can tighten it up. You could also pull it down toward your chin if you don't want your nose and mouth covered!

I could see this as a great thing to being on cold days of camping, hiking and biking. I guess I may have to purchase the pink one I keep seeing!! I received this item at a promotional rate to give a fair and honest unbiased opinion. My opinion has not been influenced with any sort of pay or compensations.
summary: So soft and so warm! Wonderful quality

reviewText:
Okayyyy...this balaclava I got is pretty slick. We just got a huge snowstorm on the east coast a couple weeks ago and I didn't have it then. First off, I prolly wouldn't walk into a convenience store in the middle of the night with it on. They may get the impression you aren't there to buy their week old stale bacteria infested hot dogs. It looks like some sort of ISIS starter kit to the average person. So I hope you don't go walking around a southern hick town talking jibberish. You may wind up in trouble with the local gents. :-) I could classify this as a hoodie without the sweatshirt. As you can tell by the pics, it covers your ears, most of your face-- good especially if you're pretty ugly. At least then you'll wind up looking like the grim reaper in wintertime :)all in all it's built for this hard core weather....All you need is some Xtra strong spf chapstick, face lotion, crappy weather, and this hoodie and you're set!!!!!!

BTW... I did receive this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased opinion...
They are the real deal ACC mercurial vapors! Fit perfectly with just enough room and are so comfortable! Can't believe I found these, cant wait to wear them!

reviewText:
This waist trainer is pretty much what I expected. I have been waist training off and on over the past 4 or 5 months or so and with the recent weight loss I've made it was time to drop down a size with my waist trainer. I can definitely see a difference in my shape from before I began waist training and my shape now. It does help to encourage the body to draw in around the waist to better define my hips. I usually wear one for about 3-5 hours a day for a week or so and then take a week off. I don't know if it is better for my body that way or not but I feel like I should probably give it a break sometimes, I don't want to overdo it.  Although the latex makes me sweat underneath I don't notice it at all until I remove it. It doesn't feel hot, I think it just causes a little sweat because of the lack of air flow. It doesn't transfer through the cincher onto my clothing either so know one else can tell.

This waist trainer seems to be well made. The eye hooks and seams are all strong and it is the right length for me to be comfortable. Well, as comfortable as I can be in a waist trainer lol. It definitely helps keep me sitting up straightly and remembering to hold myself firm. This is the first time I've tried this brand but I'm very happy with it.

As an Amazon Top Reviewer I did receive my waist trainer as a free promotional sample for testing and evaluation purposes. I was not paid for my review and was asked only to provide whatever feedback I may have about the product, whether it be positive or negative. I welcome both positive or negative feedback as well. My review is solely based on my experience and honest opinions of this waist trainer.
summary: Really helps! Well made and strong seams and hooks.

So far it's been a great purchase.  We had a bad cold snap in KC, it kept me warm during sub-zero weather.

Pros:
- Very warm for my climate (eastern Kansas), the hood is really nice for blocking the wind
- TONS of pockets
- Two really big mesh pockets inside at the bottom, they will hold a hat, two gloves, and a balaclava easily - great feature

Cons:
- It's a bit large in some areas, like the upper arms
- I would prefer velcro instead of snaps for the zipper cover in front
- There's a flap inside at the top of the front zipper that makes it a little difficult to zip all the way up
summary: So far it's been a great purchase. We had a bad cold snap in ...

This is an average parka for moderate winter activity.  I bought it for a cattle ranch where checking cows is done in severe winds or minus 20 degrees F.  I have to wear a jacket under it for warmth on the arms.  The hood is big enough to fit over a beach ball, so I put it over the hood of the jacket and twist it as tight as I can.  So,  I have this cone shape mass that sticks up and at first the cows had concern.  I wanted to put my radio phone in the inside breast pocket to keep it warm, but available.  The pocket is a bit short.  I keep my note pad and pens in the outside lower pocket, but the velcro is hard to open with gloves on.  Those pockets are quite large.  I can make do with this if it is not under 10 below zero F.  We had minus 20 F this last winter and this coat left me cold.  My biggest problem with the coat has been doing up the zipper.  It can take a long time and I have even had others help me with it.  This coat is not for extreme conditions.  It is a men's coat and I am a woman so there is way too much room in the stomach area and the hips are ok.  I bought it larger than what I needed.  Still it is about the best I could find, but I am not much of a shopper.
summary: For winter down to zero, this coat is fine (except for the zipper).

needed to get some compression socks, because I stand on my feet all day at work, and it has definitely taken its toll on my feet and legs. I have pretty thick calves, but these compression socks still fit me perfectly. They're also extremely well-made, so I don't think I will have to worry about them stretching out. The very first day I wore them, I noticed a huge improvement in how badly my feet hurt at the end of the night. Now, after having worn them everyday for a few days now, I can honestly say feet and legs are feeling less sore, and the amount of time it has taken for them to stop hurting once I'm home as gone down by quite a lot. Prior to trying these compression socks, my feet would just hurt the entire day, from the moment I woke up until I went to bed at night. Sometimes, they hurt so much that I could barely walk. Since trying these, I haven't really had to worry about that, which is wonderful for me.

reviewText: Great dress.  Got lots of compliments on it.  I did take the bow off the side, which was really easy to do.  (not my style) My only complaint is that I washed the dress in COLD water and it still shrank.  The tag says it can be hand washed in cold, but they recommend dry cleaning.  I'm not dry cleaning a $12 dress.  And since it hangs to dry, mine got really wrinkly.  As it had already shrunk, I was afraid to steam the dress.  I work it a little wrinkly and no one seemed seemed to notice all that much.  Next time I am going to try some wrinkly release spray on it.

The dress is nice, but bust is a bit snug. I removed the bow because I didn't like it on the dress, it is very easy to remove it. the red color is so beautifully bright, prettier than I expected for the price! I ordered red, blue and purple and wish that I had ordered the black also. though they are all the same size dresses, they have different fit (I think someone made a mistake when making the dress! Beware of having problems with the zipper and also know that it is absolutely impossible not to have wrinkles in this dress, no matter how many times you iron these cotton dresses wrinkles keeps coming back easily. These dresses are still worth more than the price of purchase for $12.99 though!

reviewText: This was a gift and my wife loves it.
Fun and so colorful!  Thick enough, but not too thick. VB beach towels are amazing.

Vera Bradley Beach Towel in Pink Swirls I have been looking for a nice beach towel that was pretty to look at and was good quality. This beach towel hit the nail on the head for both of those items. After receiving the towel, my family took a trip to the beach where I received a ton of compliments on its appearance. I agree it is beautiful but that's not my favorite thing about this towel. The quality is great! It is thick enough to soak up water when you are drying off but not so thick that it becomes extremely heavy or won't dry. In addition, the size is just right as it covers a chaise lounge chair well. Since purchasing this item I have washed it many many times and the beach towel still looks the same as the day I bought it. It does not shrink or fade. I have since bought several others in different patterns to give as gifts. Each person that I have given one to inevitably calls me to tell me how much they loved it after using it. My husband and I own a pool and, therefore, we own many beach towels. This is by far my favorite. I would definitely recommend this towel and any other Vera Bradley patterns in towels.
summary: You Can't Go Wrong With This Towel

So the cons are most definitely the missed mark on sizing. That being said, if the sizing had been correct.. I would have ordered a few more for the whole family. I love the contrast between the black and white color theme and the material is very soft against the skin. My favorite part of the jacket is actually the breath-ability of the fabric. Due to a genetic disorder, I am allergic to sunlight so regardless of the weather, year round I have to wear long sleeves and jackets to stay protected.. as you can imagine, that can get very hot! This is the perfect material to feel cool. I will be keeping an eye on this one to see if the sizing gets worked out so I can try it again hopefully for the whole family.

With my son's birthday coming up, I purchased the Dreamone Men's Zipper Hoodie with him in mind.

He is about 5'9" tall, about 190 pounds and wears about a size 44 jacket.  With this in mind and also knowing how he likes his clothes to fit him, I thought the XX-Large was a great choice based on the size chart in the item description.  As items like this come from overseas, they have a different cut and style to the clothing, so the size chart is a must.  A XX-Large there was very close to a normal large he would buy.  Even at XX-large, It fits close to the body.  Once it gets warm, he is a tank top kid and the hoodie fits over that like a light shirt.  Great to have in the car for after the gym too.  Not to heavy to get over heated and it breathes well.

Unfortunately, just out of the package, the hoodie I received had a decent sized foot print on it and I had to fight through a lot a left-over threading.  It seems a little QC before packaging is in order.  I rated this 4 stars based on this.  I don't mind washing the clothes before wearing them, we usually do anyhow, but it should still be clean inside the packaging.  Once the hanging threads were handled (I cut them with a sharp set of scissors, then a quick blast of heat from a lighter to seal the edge), everything else looked good.  The seams are very solid around sleeves, hood, and zipper.  The zipper has a nice even pull to it and it easily glides from top to bottom without any snags or loose teeth.

When he received the present, he was completely thrilled.  I don't normally buy him clothes.  One, he's old enough to do it himself and two, our styles don't always line up.  The Dreamone hoodie with it's classic white and black design was a complete winner.  Please note, I was lucky enough to receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Form fitting hoodie with a clean and classic style, great for warm nights that you just need that little extra.

reviewText: Beautiful dress but size is off

I'm going to try a size 14 instead and hold on to the size 10 in the meantime. It's a beautiful dress and flattering, but you have to have a lot of time to find your right size. Definitely order up. Also, the dress will most definitely be too long, so factor in tailoring costs as well.

- comfortable, well-made glasses in wide range of magnification options
- low-profile, attractive case easy to open

But when it's time to stow them back in the case, it's not just throw & go. I have to seat them exactly right in the case, which takes several seconds of fiddling and many tries, and even then the case seems barely to clasp and the hinges gasp (rhyme intended, thank you very much) at the strain. I wanted these to be perfect, and they're 70% of the way there.
summary: Great glasses, but fussy to close the case

reviewText: These glasses are GREAT!  I had cataract surgery a few months ago and now only need reading glasses.  I now have several pair and keep them all over the house, the car, and in my fishing tackle box.
Great price, solid glasses, quick shipping: ALL GOOD.
My favorite. I have them all over the house. Lightweight and comfortable.

My wife needed glasses with a slim hard case and found these.  The case she had for years was much higher quality so only time will tell with these, as the cases seem to be much thinner and appear to have very little actual aluminum.

I needed something that would fit my giant gaming laptop after I found out that my old backpack was too small. This backpack does it and it looks good! These are the dimensions of my laptop: L x W x H, 16.65 x 11.54 x 1 inches.

The shoulder straps are wide, placed well, and padded which makes for really comfortable use.

The backpack could be made with higher quality materials, but the material isn't bad. Definitely good quality for the price.

I will update this review in a couple of week! Today is day 1 with the product and these are my initial impressions.

TL;DR: If you've got a huge laptop, this backpack should be a top consideration.
summary: Fits my huge gaming laptop, still looks slim and sleek!

reviewText: Nice box chain. Attractive. Well made.
Love this backpack. I was having a hard time finding a backpack for my 19 inch laptop, and this one is perfect.

Backpack is huge! Has plenty of room and pockets. The only reason I give it 4 instead of 5 is the zippers need to be more rugged in design due to the weight of what you put in the bag. They can split open when bag is weighed down.

This backpack is huge. If you're looking for the perfect laptop bag for a 17+ inch laptop, then you found it. I am able to fit my laptop, the charger, a cooling fan, my USB mouse and keyboard, plus my schoolbooks and still have some room to spare. Straps feel comfortable, the only downside is that with so much room the backpack will get heavy fast when filled up.
summary: Huge backpack for large laptop users

It also does not come with any kind of camisole so you will have to wear something under it.  Additionally, the color is a true coral- in that even though the photo looks a little more on the pink side, the actually color of the blouse has more of an orange tint. For sizing reference,  I'm 5'5", 126 lbs, about a 28In waist and wear a 34B.  I bought a medium and it fit perfectly.  It's not tight in the arms but it's well fitting where it should be. It's both stylish and comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this purchase. :)

I was weighing out making a hat or buying one for my sons Mad Hatter costume because I am making everything else myself, but $15.99 is a cheaper deal than if you buy the same hat and a wig separately, and it will save me a load of time constructing one from cardboard, possibly paper mache, and cloth. The hat has a wire brim, and light cardboard top. The cloth is a little padded, but this ships in a flat box, in a bag, so you will need to fluff it up some. We stuffed a towel inside of it. The hair is decent, not too full or fluffy, but not sad looking like some I have seen. The sash is great, I just wish both ends had been finished with the fringe, as one end is raw and might fray. The hair is not as fluffy as the stock photo shows, and it doesnt wrap around like their photo, but it still looks great. The only thing I really don't like is the peacock feather is just cardboard, and it arrived with the edges already pulled up, exposing the white paper beneath the image. The 10/6 tag is also cardboard which is fine. We'll be replacing the peacock feather with a real one. Also, the inside of the hat has a Velcro band for adjustment, so even thought this is marked Adult Small, I can adjust it to fit my kid. I searched all over before buying this hat, looked at hat and wig separate or together on numerous sites and this price beats them all.
summary: Great wig/hat combo for the price!

reviewText: They are good. What I expected.

As I get older, I've started seeing the value in buying quality. $16 for a pair of socks? Sure, let's do this thing. I bought 5 pairs and, I have to say, when I first put them on it was like walking on a cloud; these are amazingly comfortable socks.

The problem is longevity, which is where I expected my money to go. After 5 months, all 5 pair of socks started wearing at the heel. I am only wearing these socks around the office and at home -- not even the outdoor activity which these socks bear in their name. Now, after 9 months, the heels are completely worn away and I'm just lucky the underlying mesh is still holding so they're wearable.

I emailed Smartwool customer service two weeks ago hoping I might get a response before posting a negative review here, but they didn't even bother a reply.

Unfortunately Smartwool can't match the incredible fit with better lasting material. My socks wore very thin within 5 weeks and wore through entirely after 4 months. Not what I would expect from a pricey pair of socks.

These socks are incredibly comfortable and will prevent blisters...until they stop holding up. Every pair of smartwool I have owned ends up with holes in them within less than half a year. I've officially switched off of them and onto darn tough wool socks. They aren't quite as comfortable, but have a lifetime warranty which I haven't yet had to use.

reviewText:
Not the best constructed, greatest material, or best fitting garment, but inexpensive so for the money, it's a good value. If you're looking for a comfortable dress to go out in and not have to worry if you ruin it, you've found a great option. On par with Forever 21 quality, possibly a little better, obviously this dress is not going to last a lifetime but I forsee getting at least 5-10 wears out of it, possibly more if you baby it in the laundry. Nice little number that dresses up super cute with the right accessories and shoes. Fair warning: it wrinkles easy, so hang it up after laundering to avoid having to iron it.
Fit wise, it's kinda big. I'm 5'6" and 125lbs, ordered a small, and it was a little too big. I threw a belt on over it and it looked fine. If there was an option for an X-small, I would go with that next time however, there isn't. Length wise, I was personally comfortable with where it fell but I could see some people considering it short, you do have to watch bending over. I also think the neckline is somewhat higher then pictured.
I will probably purchase again when a color comes in stock in my size. Overall, if you're looking for a cute dress to wear out to bars or clubs and be able to spill drinks out without worrying about ruining since you got such a good deal, go for this dress. Alternatively, if you're looking for a comfortable dress to wear to class or errands, this would also be a great option. If you're looking for a dress for a more formal event, something you could wear to tea with Grandma, or clothing that is going to last you a while, save your money and pass on this one.

reviewText: The dress itself is wonderful, nice material. Sadly this dress is made for a woman with skinny legs and wider stomach. Being pear shaped, in a medium, my thighs fit great, but wayyyy too loose in waist. I'll have to see if I can get it tailored,if not will return :(

The kind folks at Angvns were provided me with this Women's Retro Neck Houndstooth-Print Peplum 1/2 Sleeve Formal Pencil Dress (color: Grey, size: Medium) in exchange for sharing my unbiased review... First off, this is a houndstooth print, as pictured, not grey as listed. That aside, I love this dress and the fit is very flattering. For reference, I ordered according to the sizing information in the product description. I'm 5'2" and typically wear a size 6, 32-34C bust, 29" waist, and am pear shaped with 38" hips. The length falls just below the knees on me, making this perfect for church or work. The material is stretchy and comfortable and small print means you look smaller. I'd recommend ordering your size based on the product description. For me, the fit is right on and because of the bit of stretch, it's forgiving and looks tailored to fit. This dress is made in China. Love the elegant neckline, peplum waistline, and 3/4 length sleeves. The zipper is well hidden and pulls smoothly and easily. The fabric is of a nice light weight. It's thick enough to not be see through and thin enough to keep cool. Love that it's light enough to wear through Spring and Summer but could really be worn in all seasons. No need to wear a specific type of bra or a slip, it's not lined but the fabric is modest. This is an easy outfit. I machine washed it in warm water, as instructed, and hung dry. Didn't experience any shrinking, fading or pilling. I washed it in a lingerie wash bag so that the buttons wouldn't snag other articles of clothing and vise versa. If you don't already have some and are interested, these are sold here on Amazon and I recommend them, Allove Set of 4 Premium Micro-mesh Laundry Bags for Delicates, Sweater, Bras, and Organizations(Allove1402) (I've reviewed them with photos on the product page and they're holding up well). I think for the current price of under $20, this is a great value. Perfect for office to evening wear. Hang drying does leave it a bit wrinkled but nothing a light ironing can't handle. Overall, this dress is well made and arrived with no loose seams. I've had it for three months and it's holding up beautifully. I wouldn't pair them all together but will also note that it nicely matches a houndstooth hat, scarf, and pair of shoes that I own (so the print is not an off shade from what's popular). Uploading some photos so you can get a closer look at it upon arrival, see the fabric blend and wash instructions. Smile. Hope this is helpful!
summary: Classy And Versatile Dress......... See Photos~

reviewText: ANGVNS Women's Retro Neck Hounds tooth-Print Peplum 1/2 Sleeve Formal Pencil Dress It can be a challenge purchasing clothing on line. You always worry if it will fit, how long the skirt will be and if the style will suit your figure. When I saw this dress on Amazon, I fell in love. I adore the hounds tooth pattern. This outfit looks really expensive. I ordered a medium and worried that it might not fit. When it arrived I was so excited, it fit perfectly. The fabric is quite thick. No need to wear a slip. It is made of a cotton, nylon and spandex blend. The fabric is one way stretch. It will hug your curves but will not stretch at the hem or the sleeves. Fabric care is hand or machine wash on delicate cycle. Dry cleaning can be used alternately as well. This dress was thoughtfully designed. It has a slight retro style. It looks like a two piece but is actually one. This dress features a peter pan collar accented with velvet covered buttons, length sleeves, a peplum waist and zippered clousure. The skirt is tapered down to fit the hips and hug the curves. Hem is slightly below the knee (on me) and has a kick pleat at the back. The peplum and collar are trimmed in black piping. And looks great. The quality of this dress is astounding. This is absolutely a high end dress. Great care was taken when this dress was made. The stitching is flawless and seems are straight. The zipper is a high end invisible zipper that operates smoothly. And maybe I should have lead with this; it is wrinkle free. I recently lost 77 pounds. I haven't had a beautiful dress like this in my closet since I was a teen. I love having this dress as part of my wardrobe. I am really enjoying it. I hope this information has been helpful to you if you are considering purchasing this item.  ANGVNS Women's Retro Neck Houndstooth-Print Peplum 1/2 Sleeve Formal Pencil Dress Gray M Item received on a promotional basis for a honest and unbiased review.

Product: Fiream Boys Cotton Numbers Print T-Shirt
Size: 3T
Style: Blue - "I am 2"

I ordered this short sleeve shirt for my two year old son, who loves construction vehicles, to wear over the summer. When the shirt arrived, he excitedly called out the number on the shirt - "Two! Two!" while pointing at the construction vehicle on the front. My initial observation of the quality of the shirt upon opening the package was that the shirt was well-made, with no uneven areas or defects. The material itself is cotton and is on the thin side but still durable. This is not too thick to where it would be too hot during the summer, but not too thin to where it will wear and get holes, or look see-through. The color is vibrant and is true to what I saw on my computer screen when ordering. The applique of the number/contruction vehicle is made of fabric, not plastic or iron-on, which increases the quality drastically in my opinion. The shirt overall is soft and attractive, and well made. It washed well and fit my size 3T two year old true to size. This will be a shirt he will wear a LOT all summer long! I definitely will be coming back to purchase the "I am 3" shirt next year once we see what size he's grown into for next summer, as I am very impressed with the style of this shirt as well as Fiream's quality in making this shirt.

I've been using this for a month and the top compartment already ripped after the 3rd use. I suppose I can sew the edge back, but I know it's not going to last much longer. If you actually fill up all 3 compartments, you will have trouble closing the bag since it's held together by 2 magnetic circular clasps. The outside material feels good enough, and the overall bag is simple, clean looking. However, I don't think the mesh will last if you use this heavily or pack a lot of items. I'd recommend this for someone who packs very lightweight, no bulky items, and who uses this a few times a year for light travel. Otherwise, there are better bags out there for travel and daily use. For my use, I'll look for a wider travel bag with stronger mesh, so I can pack more products and be able to close the bag nicely.

This bikini is so beautiful and sexy. I got the blue and white, and I love the contrast of colors and the unique design. I am 5'5, about 110 lbs, and am a 34 small C. I ordered a size small, and it fits me just as I expected it would. This is a well made bikini. The stitching is nicely done with straight seams, and no loose threads or snags. The straps are sewn securely on, and seem like they will hold up well. I really like the fact that both the top and bottom are lined. The top has pads in it, which I always appreciate as it provides a little extra shape, and helps prevent the nipple show through we all get when we are cold. Lol. The bottom came with a sanitary lining in it which I also appreciate. I love the way this bikini fits on me. It definitely is a more risque suit, and not something I would wear to take my kids to the public pool or beach, but for a romantic getaway with my husband it is absolutely perfect. The back definitely not full coverage, but is not a thong either. I would say it covers about half the "cheeks". I am very happy with this bikini, and can't wait for the warmer weather when I can wear it. If you are looking for a skimpier bikini that is flattering, and unique I would definitely recommend this one. *I received this bikini at a discounted price for testing purposes, and for an honest review. The opinions in this review are 100% my own based on my experience with the product, and I made no commitment to leave a positive review.*

reviewText:
I purchased this lovely top for my lovely wife as a gift for her birthday.  She likes loose top so I knew that she will love this one.  I was not mistaken then because when she received it from me, she told me it is a very nice top.  I asked her things she liked about it.  She said, she liked how it perfectly fit her and she liked how comfortable it is to wear.  It is soft and freely flowing.  She liked how the fabric feels. This is not thick nor thin as well.  It is just right that this can be worn this spring time, even summer or fall. It is simple but it is not plain at all, rather it is elegant  in style.  She liked that it will not overpower her necklace and other accessories that will go along with her overall outfit. It goes pretty well with her pants or her leggings.  She also said that this will also be perfect for belts or buckles.  The color was vibrant and did not fade when she washed it in the washing machine.  The quality of the material for which this top is made is very fine.  I think this will serve her for a long time which is really nice.  Although I can tell that this will be one of her favorites as I already had seen her wore this like three times.  Overall she was happy with the top.
I was able to get this nice product on a discount and I am happy to be able to share as well my fair and honest feedback about it.

I have been in desperate need of a new pair of sunglasses for almost a year now. I recognize that i'm doing a great deal of squinting while i'm driving during the day and I know protecting your eyes from UV rays is important. These glasses provide 100% UV protection! They are lightweight and exactly what I needed. I know they say men's but personally I never like the ladies style of sunglasses. I wanted something more squared and sleek instead of rounded and pink. The nose piece on these glasses is rubbery and flexible so they don't slide down my nose when I start to sweat and I haven't noticed a "I just took my sunglasses off" dent on my nose either. I'm pretty clumsy and have already dropped these glasses several times. Due to their light weight plastic design they haven't broken, bent or even scratched. These aren't the most spectacular sunglasses but if you are cheap like me and clumsy or forgetful (my last pair were lost somewhere -- probably the kids toy box) these glasses are definitely for you. I do want you to know that while i'm not affiliated with this seller I did receive these glasses in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.
summary: Protecting my Eyes One Pair at a Time

reviewText:
The Handmade Genuine Real Black & Brown Vintage Leather Wrist Cuff Bracelet with Retro Copper Constellation Zodiac Sign arrived on time and intact. I was extremely happy to find that it fits my wrist perfectly. I have a small wrists and unfortunately most bracelets are too large but this is a great fit. I did have it tightened most of the the way but I like the loose dangling twine so it works for me! I was also very happy that it looks just as the listing shows and is even better in person. Definitely a fine handcrafted bracelet with great attention to detail. The the metal zodiac plate is securely fastened with twine that is intricately wrapped around the thick cow hide. It's available in all the zodiac signs but I ordered the Taurus symbol. I want to add that the the detail in my Taurus stamp is very precise. Very impressive since you only see that kind of detail in high end jewelry. At first the bracelet is very stiff but I was happy to find that after wearing a few times it has softened up. This is a nice well made and stylish bracelet. Designed to look great and last a lifetime. A great find and perfect gift for a friend or family member.

 If this review was helpful, please let me know by voting it up

I disagree with it saying that it's "plus sized" when they only offer the largest as an 8/10 and actual "plus size" begins at 16 typically.  I am a size 12, but I thought I would give this suit a try because I have been in need of a one piece suit for swimming.  Bikinis just aren't made for active swimming!
I struggle with finding a decent fitting one piece suit because I'm tall - and it's nearly impossible to find something at a low price that isn't giving me an epic weggie or cameltoe because it's made for shorter people, so that is super frustrating. It's not something you find on the rack for 20-30 bucks at your big box stores and I'm not looking to drop over 100 bucks on a suit I just want for functionality.
This suit works for what I am looking for, although I would prefer the shoulder straps would cross over in the back so that I could be sure they wouldn't slide off my shoulders while I'm swimming, although that hasn't happened yet so it could be OK, just something that concerns me a little.
So - while it is not technically a plus size, it's got enough give in the 8/10 size to fit me as a 12.  The bust is a great fit (I'm a 36DD), and the best part of this suit for me is that it is for a Long Torso (I'm 5'10").
I picked out the dark blue and black suit and it is the same color as pictured on the site.  It's not a "slimming" suit, so if you have a tummy pouch, you're probably still going to see it a little because it doesn't hold it in for you, but because of the style it is more flattering than other one piece suits. The material is similar to other swimsuits, not too thin that it seems flimsy or cheaply made. The top does have some padding to maintain your modestly. The bottom cut is very modest as well, full coverage of the cheeks and not high-cut in the hips either. Modesty isn't my main purpose of buying this suit, but for those who are looking for something modest it would be a good choice.
I only rated it a 4-star because it is not technically a Plus Size suit, but everything else is pretty spot on. I received this product at a discounted price or for free in exchange for an honest review.

This is such a weird top. I don't even know how to say it fits because it's all over the place. I got a US10 (tag on the shirt itself says XL) but it is pretty form-fitting in the body, and I generally wear a medium or even a small. I would say the body of the XL (US10) is probably closer to a biggish size medium or a smallish size large (or M/L I suppose would also be an accurate descriptor). The top straps on the shoulders, however, are waaaay too long. They make this shirt sit super low on my chest, and the arms sag way down and are almost full-length sleeves on me, which might possibly be somewhat cute except the gap between that first strap on top and the next one down on the arm is just really big, and everything is super saggy and loose and gappy and just not in any way cute at all. It just looks so weird. Luckily, I can make this wearable by altering the straps at the top to be about half the length they came, and then it fits pretty much how it looks on the model in the picture. So I'm going to describe the fit as "too small" because while the sleeves can be made to fit in a decent way, since the strappy parts are pretty thin and easy to cut and resew back in place (although I have to remove stars for even needing to do that in the first place), the body is not anywhere near a size XL. Still, I guess if you know what you're getting into it's a reasonably cute and comfortable top, as long as you size way up and are open to making some modifications.
summary: I got a US10 (tag on the shirt itself says XL) but it is pretty form-fitting in the body

This dress is gorgeous. I love all the beadwork on the top and the chiffon layer really makes this dress look super feminine.
The dress is really long. Of course I am only 49 so everything is long on me. I had to have the dress taken in not only in the length but also the bust area. I ordered this dress in a size 6. For reference my measurements are 34 (B) bust, 28 waist, and 36 hips.

The measurements for this dress in a size 6 are as follows:
__________________________

Front Length  60
Back length - 73.5
Across bust  16
Across waist  14
_________________________

The dress fit fine everywhere except the bust and length as I stated prior. The bust was quite a bit too big in the cup area. I have a B cup and this dress seems more appropriate for a minimum D cup.  I had to have it altered in that area as well. I think this dress was made to fit a larger busted girl than I am.

Other than the fact that I had to have it altered to fit, the dress is beautiful. It seems to be well-made. All beadwork was in place and the seams all lined up. This dress looked just like a dress I might buy in a higher end department store during prom season. To me it looks like at least a 300 dollar dress.

Overall I am super pleased with this dress. I am not sure when I will have the occasion to wear it but I am sure sooner or later something will come up.

reviewText: Exactly what I wanted!  The quality was better than expected, and the overall roominess is great.  Another nice thing in comparison to other rolling luggage, is the the bag portion will lay flat (like a duffel bag or backpack would) when it is empty.  So it doesn't take up as much space in your closet as standard rolling suitcases. This is perfect and will be well worth it!

reviewText: good color design

I purchased the Fashion Drop Earrings with Soft Cream Simulated Pearl Fireball and the red is utter crap. I opened the box to find pastel pink earrings! The upper red crystal is in fact red but the pearl isnt, it's a very noticeable pink color. I would've returned these earrings if it wasn't so much of a hassle. However I am going to keep them, I was able to correct the coloring using a red permanent marker and now they are a nice vibrant red and I like them. But I shouldn't have to use a Sharpie to color them correctly. You've been warned, only order the red if you are okay with pink pearls or if you have a red Sharpie on hand.

I'm including pictures, the one on the left is the original earrings. Although it's difficult to tell in the picture, they are very pink. The picture on the right is after I took the red Sharpie to them and colored them red. You can tell there's a difference.

This is my rating system:
1 star: I hated it
2 stars: I didn't like it
3 stars: I'm neutral about it
4 stars: I liked it
5 stars: I loved it

I am a big fan of the fish hoop type earrings. I just find that it makes them that much easier to wear and adjust. They do not slide off as easily as others so that you do not have to worry ab out losing them. I hate when I lose an earring as i wear them.

The red pearl is more of an orangey red which is perfect during the summer time. The shape is just perfect. Not too big nor too small where you cannot even tell you are wearing earrings. The top piece gives just enough sparkle.

I was offered this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

The earrings arrived very quickly and looks exactly as shown in the red I chose. It came in a very pretty gift box with a bow on it, The ball part has red crystals on it that were all in tact and had a red pearl like ball on the bottom drop of it. They look great on and are easy to wear. They are light in weight and I get a lot of compliments when I wear them. They are a nice pair of earrings. This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. When I am asked to review a product all my opinions are completely my own! I always read other reviews before purchasing any product myself and rely on them myself. My son absolutely adores this hat!  The quality of the hat is okay.  It's thick that even though the packaging made it arrive quite crumbled, it bounced back and was ready to be worn.  My ten year old has a rather large head, so this hat fits him perfect, with a little room.  He loves to style up for church, so this is right up his alley.  The band that went around could've been put on a little better though, it looks like it was thrown on just to complete it, but that is only noticeable if you are staring at it in your hands.  But while on a person walking around, you can't notice it.  Overall a good hat to have in the wardrobe.  I was fortunate to have received this hat a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This hat has the potential to be a great addition to any wardrobe.

The weave is close, and solid looking.  The color is beautiful.  It is well constructed.

The interior of the hat is lined and there is an additional sweatband lining.

The hat is a bit small for an adult head  it does fit, but is snug.  Maybe it will stretch over time?

I wanted to give this hat a five-star review but I had problems receiving the product in good condition.  The first time the hat was shipped to me Amazon decided to crumple the hat into a too-small box with other items.  The hat measures 10.5-inches across and stands 4.5-inches tall.  It was crammed into a 7-inch box that was 5.5-inches tall.

It took much discussion to get Amazon to send a replacement.  When they did it was in a proper sized box, but the hat was still folded and crumpled.

I realize that this sounds like it should be an Amazon issue and not a reason to ding the hat  but the manufacturer has provided the hat to Amazon in nothing other than a protective plastic bag.  It is poorly designed to survive the shipping process.
If this is something you plan to add to your wardrobe, do so well in advance of when you need it as you will need some time to reshape the hat.

I was given the opportunity to purchase this hat at a discounted rate, in exchange for my unbiased review. Based on my experience, with the specific hats I have received, I would recommend this to family and friends.

I was very pleased with this hat and glad that I purchased it. The fedoral is not a common hat which is why I have been looking for a decent one for a while and glad that I found this one. Another positive thing is that it is lightweight, some hats are very thick and make your head sweat but with this one is very light and you can feel the air pass through. The design is great and overall I am glad that I purchased this hat.

I received this handsome Fedora hat yesterday in the brown/gray color. The color is really nice-mostly gray with little bit of brown sewn in and a dark brown/black satin trim. It seems like it might snag easily-so I'll be cautious about that. The fit is good for both me and my husband (and it even sits nicely on my 8 year old sons head). All in all I think this hat is great for casual wear and I am looking forward to wearing it on our upcoming cruise. reviewText: This dress is SO cute! I love the design and the length and the colors- so basically everything. I found the dress so comfortable to wear- even though it's winter here. Interestingly, what I consider a dress in the summer is a tunic in the winter. The dress comes to about mid-thigh on me and I am 5'5". The dress is actually pretty modest in it's neckline and the straps are relatively thick, as well. The fabric isn't stretchy, but it is flowy and the relatively firm fabric is VERY flattering because it doesn't show a lot of rolls or and underwear lines. I did use a fabric steamer on it to get the wrinkles from being shipped out. The design is gorgeous. I love how the front is patterned so colorfully because it means that I don't have to wear a necklace with it and it will still look dressed up! The coloring is super flattering on tan or pale (me!) skin. I'm very happy with this dress and can't wait to wear it more! I received this dress at a discount for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Beautiful and it's NOT just for summer!

I received these boot cuffs at a reduced price in exchange for an honest and fair review. I was really excited when I had the opportunity to order the XY ZONE Women Winter Dashed Leg Warmer Button Crochet Knitted Socks. I ordered the white ones because I thought they would go with any outfit. I do feel they are even cuter than the images in the ad. The picture of the boot cuffs looks a bit yellow in the picture. Which could always be easily fixed having a better picture taken and with a different background color. The boot cuffs are a nice white and the threading along the top is a dark brown with a brown button. First inspection the quality looks great and well-made.

They are somewhat stretchy, but they will fit quite snug. At first they seem not as stretchy but I think over time they will loosened up.
I really don't think in time they will stay stretchy. But let's hope they do after washing so. Hopefully they won't start getting loose and not stay up because that would totally ruin the look.

They do feel really soft, warm and cozy. These cuffs will definately keep my legs warm in the winter months. And tops off my boots makes an adorable outfit. The buttons seem really securely sewn and I have had no issues with them becoming loose. They fit great over skinny jeans or leggings and under any boots. These warmers stayed in place after having them on for a few hours. I do feel the run a little small for most ladies but they are ok for me. I do think they should be hand washed instead of machine wash because I do feel they are a little delicate for that and might fray.

As someone who wears boots all the time, these were hard to pass up. They're super cute, not very long (and so they don't add a lot of extra heat to the boots (which is good) and they're very comfortable. They are not thick, which means you can wear them with a lot of different boots, unlike the chunkier types that sometimes just don't work with every pair of boots. They appear to be well made and will probably last a long time, and because they are cream they go with a lot of different color outfits. The one and only thing on this particular pair is that they did have a small string that was hanging off them, but it was easily woven back into the inside of the leg warmer and tied off, I didn't feel comfortable cutting it as I wasn't sure if it would cause them to unravel. After I did that, there really wasn't much of an issue.  Very happy with this purchase!

I love this ring. It is very pretty and is a good quality. It is also light weight you barely know it's there.

The Pros:
- Comfort fit band, very comfortable!
- Delicate looking, I love the 3mm width
- Pretty color difference from the usual blacks, silvers, and yellow golds
- All CZ sparkly, clear, and accounted for
- I think it just plain looks pretty
- STAINLESS STEEL. Will NOT turn your skin green like silver rings with a higher nickel filler content.
- Unique, and definitely affordable

The Cons:
- Ever so slightly darker color than the typical pinky pale rose gold. The actual color of the ring I received is closer to the copper tone of a new US penny.

3mm Stainless Steel Thin Prong Cubic Zirconia Wedding Ring Bands for Men and Women, Gold/black/rose Why choose Stainless steel Jewerly? Stainless steel has become an increasingly popular metal choice for fashion jewelry, because of it's bright,silvery finish and its resistance to tarnish, Excellent Durability etc. It not like silver will be getting black,not like copper jewelry allergy prone, not as alloy jewelry because of lead. Stainless steel jewelry is Fade-resistant,No Rust, Anti-allergy.
I received my ring in the mail about an hour ago, and have been wearing it since. I find it pleasant to wear, due to the inner rim of the band, which is designed a comfort fit - this means the inside is rounded slightly, which leaves no edges to dig into your skin when you move your fingers at the wrong angle (and though this one is just my opinion, I find it also suspends the band ever so slightly above your skin so that it allows the skin under it to breathe a little better and not chafe). I love comfort fit bands, and am pleased that this one is.

The color of the rose gold is slightly darker than I expected, and if I had any cons about this ring it would be this: the color is a bit closer to a light copper in my opinion, and while I note this with a mild disappointment, it's still quite beautiful. The CZ gems are clear, sparkling, and a bright white; they are set without visible prongs into the band, and while I wonder if they will hold up to every day life and the test of time, the ring IS made of steel, so I would hope that will mean that they will remain there. None are missing as of receiving the ring, so we're off to a good start!

It's a very simple and classy ring, and I think that it fits well. It feels like these are true to size. The band doesn't feel too wide or thick to me, and I do like that this is stainless steel. I really can't say more about it other than this is super cute, and I'm very glad I got this!!

I purchased this Watch as a gift for my nephew and he loves it.

This thing is very large, it's definitely more for someone with big hands and beefy wrists. It's certainly attractive enough, even somewhat mysterious looking as light bounces off the seeming vast field of blackness within the bezel.

The four function buttons are arranged in a line along the left side of the watch body (rather than the usual 2 and 2 placement); this contributes to the sleek look because the bezel extends a bit past the main body, so that the buttons appear flush with the bezel - a nice little design touch. The buttons are large but, in keeping with the sleek design, are spaced right next to one another with no separation - smaller buttons spaced a bit apart would be more effective, especially if you use the various alarm/timer/chrono functions a lot. Fortunately, the Light button is topmost.

(The bezel, by the way, is actually a ring that you can rotate counter-clockwise (making a little clicking noise as it moves); there are 4 little square indentations that seem to correspond with the four buttons so you can rotate the ring to position them next to the buttons. I'm not sure what purpose this serves and there's nothing in the instructions about it.)

The display is a bit of a mixed bag. First, there's an inner bezel that's slightly bigger than the outer bezel on the case; this means the actual face is smaller than you expect and the figures seem a bit spidery (in relation to the size of the watch); not a problem if you have the watch up near your face but could be when glancing down at your wrist for some people. The silvery-grey LCD against the black face is well-defined *provided* you can get the light to bounce off at the right angle; this may involve twisting your wrist around when the light is dim. The blue illumination is 'subtle', especially, again, at some distance from your face.

This watch is not only large but it's also quite thick so you may have problems buttoning a long-sleeve cuff over it.

Overall, this a handsome watch, on a scale of S-M-L-XL-Huge-Massive, a solid XL. A few niggles but they're all fairly minor. Price was quite reasonable. You'll probably get some nice compliments on it.

Watch works great.  I've received several compliments on it recently.  I bought this watch primarily as a work watch and it has held up well.  I work in an industrial environment and so far there are no scratches on the crystal.  The rotating bevel is elevated sufficiently enough to provide pretty good protection to the crystal from glancing blows.  The bevel spins but serves no purpose really.  Honestly, I would prefer it not to spin at all and be in a fixed position.
The buttons are what I expected although I question how intuitive the operational functions are, like setting the time and date.  I figured it out but the sequence of buttons I had to press didn't seem logical to me.  I am not a watch expert.  Just to be clear.  This nuisance won't matter to most though.  Once the time is set, you really won't have to worry about it for at least 6 months for those living in time zones using day light savings.  The watch does not automatically adjust for DST so you will need to adjust it.
Apart from these minor things, the watch is cool.  Stylistically, it is cool enough to elicit the attentions of my colleagues, and it keeps times perfectly well.  It is also, as is advertised, waterproof.  I have had this watch in the shower and submerged in water without issue.  However, do not operate the buttons while in the water as the instructions indicate.
For $12.00, you can't beat it.  Great watch.  Great Value.
summary: Watch works great. I've received several compliments on it recently

reviewText: Worth the money.....

This is easily one of my favorite samples I have been sent from Ann Arbor. Along with it fitting how I want a shirt to fit, I enjoy watching people read the shirt and try to figure out the play on words. You can wear it out without feeling scummy for having an inappropriate shirt on.
I recently had a chance to review several different sample t-shirts from Ann Arbor T-Shirt Co. Each shirt is a 100% cotton blend and has a soft and comfortable feel. I like a thicker t-shirt as a preference and usually the softer t-shirts do not offer the durable thick feel I look for. This blend for each of these shirts has found a nice balance in soft and thick. The shirts fit snug around the neck and shoulders and relax as it tapers down the arms. The tail of the shirt also tapers a small amount and creates a more fitted feel without getting tight. The screen printing is very pliable and held up to a first wash very well! That first wash also did not shrink any of the shirts in question.
Again, I did receive these samples at a discount (Not Free) in exchange for my opinion. I was not asked to provide a positive review! If this helps hit the Yes button, please.
summary: Particle Collisions give Me a Hadron

reviewText:
My husband is a certified gun smith and a gun enthusiast, so this was the perfect t-shirt to show off his love of guns in a fun way.  The tshirt fits him well (we ordered a size large, which is his normal size, and it fits as a large should).  The material of the tshirt is on the thing side, which will be great going into the hotter months of the year.  The tag is printed on the inside of the back of the shirt, so no tag to irritate while wearing.  The picture on the front of the shirt is printed clearly, without any missing spots or breaks in the picture, and it has lasted well through several washings  no fading, of either the shirt itself or the image.  All of the seams have been stitched nicely, without any loose strings or gaps in the stitching.  The sleeves are a good length and don't get too tight towards the ends of the sleeve.  Overall, the shirt has a little stretch in all the right areas.  It didn't shrink in any noticeable way once washed, either.  Ann Arbor makes a lot of good quality tshirts that are affordable, comfortable and allow you to show off your personality in a fun way.

**I received this product at a discount for testing; the review above is a true representation of my experience with this product, and has not been influenced in any way.**
summary: Ann Arbor makes a lot of good quality tshirts that are affordable, comfortable and allow you to show off your personality

The quality of this wallet is very good. Nicely stitched and nice feeling leather. However, while the texture of the leather means that it feels good in hand and also holds onto the inside of your pocket/purse well, the problem is that it makes the actual passport hard to take out (and to also take the holder out of your pocket). Maybe this is something that improves with break-in, but I would recommend a smoother liner for the inside of the holder.

The other idea is to have a pull tab so you can pop your passport out of the holder, rather than having to tug it out of the holder.

Overall though, I really like this passport holder, it would be perfect with a few changes.

These earrings are actually a lot nicer in person than I expected them to be. They are not oversized but more delicate  a little less than two inches in length and the faceted stone is very pretty, catching the light in a very flattering way. The gold around the stone has a braided or rope-like look to it, adding a bit of texture to the overall look. Also, they feel good on  they are not heavy at all but they have enough weight to hang well.

These are apparently handmade (as opposed to machine-made, I guess) and the quality control in the factory is apparent in the final product. You will need to add your own rubber stoppers to the backs of these so they don't fall out, however.

These did come in a nice gift box with little gold dots and a lovely double ribbon appropriate for gift giving until the ugly white Amazon sticker was carelessly placed on the top of the box rendering it useless (who does that?). If you want to give this as a gift, youll have to get another box, which is unfortunate.

Otherwise, recommend.

reviewText:
This is a beautiful large lightweight wrap.  It is large enough to use as a shawl and the material is so light that using it as a collar wrap makes the nicest addition .  Beautiful design and so very, very soft.  I keep mine on the back of my computer chair at my station.  It takes up no room.  On really hot days, the a/c gets cranked up and the register blows in my direction.  My neck can cramp up so quickly.  Having the wrap within reach I can put it loosely around my shoulders.  The fabric is so light I hardly notice it at all, but when the a/c starts to blow I can wrap it loosely around my neck.  It's perfect for keeping the draft from my neck while keeping the rest of me cool.

I ordered the blue and it does have a lot of blue in it but has a lot of autumn tones in it as well (reddish oranges)  This is not a "cool" blue shading, but a "warm" shading.  It's kind of difficult to see that in the picture ad.  There the blues look much lighter than they really are.

This would make a nice waist-hip wrap over a plain skirt in any of the many colors in the wrap.  Mine has a kind of "gypsy" look to it. It has the tassels.  Notice that some of the selections have fringe and some have tassels.  I like the tassels.

Be careful in the laundering of it.  I would not use a washing machine, even on the gentle cycle.  I hand washed in mild detergent.  I would not wring it either.  I gently pushed rinse water out of it, folded once or twice, laid on large towel and rolled towel up to absorb moister.  Then I folded over a plastic hanger and air dried.  Came out really nice.  I washed mine in order to give an accurate review as I received the shawl as a gratis item in exchange for an honest review.  Really if you treat it nicely I would avoid washing until really necessary.  It washes nicely, but loses some of the original sizing properties that make it fluff up so nicely  when you first wear it.

This would be a really nice gift item for any woman or any age on any occasion.  It is one of the finest wraps I have ever seen.  Because it's made of cotton it breathes so nicely.  Most wraps are made of esters and they can make you too warm, so you're always putting them on and taking them off.  This one warms you but doesn't hold in body heat.  Really nice fabric.

This scarf is a large and colorful one, with a nice woven fabric featuring a stylish design. This could be used with a variety of wardrobe items and it would be a nice gift for a woman. I was provided a discounted sample of this for my honest, unbiased review.
summary: Attractive scarf, soft material and colorful design

reviewText:
This is a very nice set of comfortable satin pajamas.  One of the issues that I run into with pajamas of this style is that they are usually too old for me to sleep in comfortable, even in the coldest months.  These satin pajamas were not so hot that I couldn't wear them comfortably, even when the house is warm.  Another issue that I run in to with pajamas of any sort is that they usually end up being too short.  I have a nicely rounded posterior that often pulls the legs of the pajamas up to a point that they are not long enough, which drives me crazy.  I like for the legs of my pajama pants to be long enough to touch the ground, so I was very happy when these pajama bottoms still reach the ground, in spite of the fact that the pajamas ended up being too small.  I typically wear a size 12, and the size large pajamas were listed as being a size 12-14.  Really, I would size these more as a 8-10; I could get them on, but they were too tight, especially around the arms.  I didn't have any issues buttoning the pajamas in spite of the smaller size, and other than the upper arms being tight and the slight bulge it created of my stomach, the fit wasn't terrible.  I am on a weight loss journey, so I have high hopes that these pajamas will fit more comfortably when I lose another 10-15 pounds.  All of the stitching is done well, with no loose seams or strings hanging anywhere and all of the buttons are securely attached to the pajamas.  The pocket on the front is also securely attached and adds a bit of unexpected elegance to the pajamas.  My overall impression of the pajamas is positive, but make sure you order a solid size up from what you normally wear.

**I received these pajamas in exchange for product testing; the review above is a true representation of my experience with this product.  I have been in no way compensated for this review.**
summary: Comfortable and elegant; just make sure you order a size up.

Let me start with Size: All reviews are correct; go up several sizes. Here's how the XXL may fit you:
* I am a tall thin girl, size 8-10 US, and the XXL fits well. If you're any bigger than a size 12, this blouse won't fit
* My arms are a little heavy and the sleeveless openings are snug
* By bust is a 36/38 B and just fits. Anyone bigger won't fit
* My waste is very narrow and the material is generous on the sides (that was expected; I have the same issue with all blouses)
* My torso is really long and this top is actually long enough for me. Back of blouse hits right around mid-buttock like the one picture in red
* My hips are slightly larger than most, but the top falls perfectly over them. Slide slits will accommodate most hips

Now for the Quality:
* Its a blouse worth $16.99, no more or less
* The quality of the zipper is awful - it sticks, appears to be loosing teeth & barely works. It will break shortly. Since a return was difficult and would take more time/money, I elected to keep the blouse. Used a white crayon on the zipper to make it easier to move. Ill have to replace it soon.
* The fabric is not breathable and not the most flexible spandex. Feels like polyester/rayon. Some loose threads, but not bad. Frog closures and satin trim are nice. Washes easily; did not put in the dryer.
summary: An economical price, but so-so quality

My measurements are 36 bust, and 37 waist.  I have a 30 inch waist, that's just on the skin, no squeezing.  And that's at my natural waist, the smallest natural part.  If I squeeze the tape measure I can get it to an uncomfortable 27.  Based on my size I first ordered a 4xl which seemed crazy because I'm not XL sized  It fit me nice on the tightest hook.  I mean it was just comfortable hugging on my skin.  It wasn't really squeezing which is what I want it to do to train my waist.  So I returned it and ordered a Large which is for 24-26 inch natural waist.  I like it much better  It was tight on the biggest hook so it gives me room to shrink.  Some fat hangs out the top and bottom but is hidden by my bra and pants.  Since it stretches I could still breath easily.  After 3 days I could move it to the 2nd hook.  Now I don't know if the piece stretched or if I changed that allowed me to go to the 2nd hook.  Anyhow, hope this helps with measurements.  Easy return process and quick arrival of the new one.
summary: Based on my size I first ordered a 4xl which seemed crazy because I'm not XL sized It fit me nice on the tightest hook

reviewText:
Just got it 30 min ago and was anxious to try it on since many reviews noted the dress is smaller than expected. Ordered a size 10 which is a size 42 in Germany. Was a bit confused because label says 46 actually, but a sticker on the dress reads 10. If I got a 46 by mistake Id say my luck, because it fits like a glove. Maybe the company readjusted the sizes, I am sure at 57/ 170 cm and 153 lbs /69 kg I am nowhere close to a German size 46!
Material is high quality if thin which is perfect for South Texas Fall temps. No problem with the zipper, seems super sturdy but I still have wiggle room in the dress. For women with bigger upper arms: you could take elastic band out and replace with longer one. Dress goes over knees by 3, which surprised me, I am not considered petite with 57 and long legs. Overall I really love it and for $30 its a bargain! Better than most Halloween store dirndls!

reviewText: I love Fitflops.  Unfortunately, the style I REALLY want is not made anymore.  At least, I haven't been able to find it for a couple of years.  Anyway. . . . I wear a 7-7.5 and the length is fine.  The strap around the "toes" is loose.  That's ok.  But, again, the foot bed is VERY slick.  I will keep these to wear around the house.  If you are one that tends to "step" out of shoes, or not very balanced, or are always in a hurry. . .  this one is not for you.  The other one of this style, with fabric/suede straps, is extremely comfortable and the foot bed is textured.

reviewText: Took a chance on this shirt as there weren't any reviews yet, but purchased four in different colors and have been very happy with them.  They're a nice beefy mid-weight 100% cotton -- very good quality, and so far have washed well.  The lap neck is pretty much just like lap necks on American t-shirts.  The biggest thing you need to know is that the fit is slim, and they run a little small/skinny.  I bought in size 12-18 months for my very petite 17-month-old (~17 lbs) and I think she really will outgrow them right around 18 months.  Compared to other baby shirts we have, from brands like Baby Gap and Baby Boden, they run about 1" shorter and 2" or so narrower (however, sleeve length is similar).  I would suggest you size up one size, unless you have a super skinny kid like mine AND you're in the bottom end of the age range.  Wish they made these in sizes bigger than 18M; if they did I'd buy a whole bunch!
